1b1('dul ba): rgya gar skad du/ bi na ya k+Sha dra ka bstu/ bod skad du/ 'dul
1b2('dul ba): ba phran tshegs kyi gzhi/ / // bam po dang po// thams cad mkhyen pa la
1b3('dul ba): phyag 'tshal lo/ / // phran tshegs kyi gzhi'i sdom ni/ so phag chen pa
2a1('dul ba): chos gos dang / / shing tshad dang ni gnas brtan lus// rgyus
2a2('dul ba): 'gyod pa dbyung ba nyid/ / phran tshegs gzhir ni yang dag bshad// // bsdus
2a3('dul ba): pa'i sdom ni/ so phag sen mo bcos pa dang // lhung bzed yan lag me long skyes//
2a4('dul ba): lam phran chu tshags mon sran sde'u// rkang pa bkru dang gos mdud do// // sdom ni
2b1('dul ba): so phag dang ni sa gar dang / / nya phyis dri yi lag ris dang // ka ba dang ni skud pa gnyis// lag brgyan dang
2b2('dul ba): ni sor gdub rgya/ / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yangs pa can na spre'u rdzing gi 'gram khang pa brtsegs
2b3('dul ba): ba'i gnas na bzhugs so/ / drug sde nyid rnams snga dro sham thabs dang / chos gos bgos lhung bzed thogs te/
2b4('dul ba): yangs pa can du bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs pa dang / yangs pa can gyi bar dang / khang pa brtsegs pa'i bar gyi
2b5('dul ba): bar skabs de na/ yangs pa can gyi lid tsha bI rnams kyi skyed mos tshal/ me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / chu phun
3a1('dul ba): sum tshogs pa/ bya sna tshogs skad 'byin pa dga' ba'i tshal dang 'dra ba de dag na de dag gi brtul pa dang / gang
3a2('dul ba): dang / gru dang / rol mo'i gli'i cha byad sna tshogs dag dang / khrus kyi yo byad sna tshogs dag kyang bzhag pa dang / drug sde rnams kyis smras
3a3('dul ba): pa/ dga' bo nye dga' bo/ yangs pa can gyi yid tsha bI 'di dag dang / skyed mos tshal gyi dga' ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ sum cu
3a4('dul ba): rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dper mdzad na/ re zhig de dag gi skyed mos tshal ci 'dra ba blta'o zhes/ de rnams blong nas de dag gi skyed mos tshal
3a5('dul ba): du zhugs so/ / de dag gis de na brtsal ba'i yo byad mda' bo che dang / drang ba dang / 'phang rdo sna tshogs dang / gar dang / glu dang /
3a6('dul ba): rol mo'i sgra'i cha byad sna tshogs dang / bi wang dang / gling bu dang / rdza rnga dang / 'khar rnga dang / skad snyan la sogs pa sna tshogs dang
3b1('dul ba): khrus kyi yo byad so phag dang / bkru ba'i phye ma dang / mgo bkru ba skyu ru ra sna tshogs mthong ba dang / de rnams kyis phan tshun smras pa/ dga' bo nye dga' bo yo byad phun sum tshogs pa rnam pa
3b2('dul ba): du ma 'di dag yod na/ ci re zhig brtsal ba bya 'am/ 'on te gar bya 'am/ glu blang ngam/ rol mo'i sgra bya 'am/ khrus bya/ kha cig gis smras pa/ bdag cag bkrus nas ring zhig lon gyis/
3b3('dul ba): je khrus bya'o zhes de dag blod nas so phag dag gis drud cing drud nas khrus bya bar brtsams pa dang / bzo'i gnas dang las kyi gnas de dag la mkhas pas/ khrus la zhugs pa de rnams kyi sgra yid du
3b4('dul ba): 'ong ba 'di lta ste/ sil snyan yan lag lnga pa skyes bu mkhas pas legs par dkrol ba'i lta bu byung ngo // skye bo'i tshogs phal po che lam de nas 'gro bas/ sgra de thos pa dang / de rnams rna ba
3b5('dul ba): byol te yud tsam bsdad nas smras pa/ shes ldan dag yangs pa can gyi lid tsha bI rnams kyi skyed mos tshal na/ gar mkhan rnams gar byed pa lhar 'dong ngam/ de ltar bya'o zhes lhad mo la yid 'dun pa de dag
3b6('dul ba): myur bar chas te/ skyed mos tshal du dong nas/ de dag nang du zhugs pa dang / drug sde rnams kyang phyir byung ngo // de dag gis de rnams la smras pa/ 'phags pa dag phyogs gang na/ gar mkhan
3b7('dul ba): rnams gar bgyid/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ bkren pa khyed kyis bye brag mi phyed de/ gar mkhan gar byed pa la sgra 'di lta bu 'byung ngam/ 'phags pa dag 'o na 'di su'i sgra lags/ shes ldan dag
4a1('dul ba): kho bo cag lus drud nas khrus byas pa yin no/ / 'phags pa dag ci dge sbyong khyed 'dod pa'i yon tan gyis gzir ram/ bkren pa khyed kyi mgrin pa rdog pas mnan pa/
4a2('dul ba): dge sbyong kho bo cag 'dod pa'i yon tan gyis gzir to// khyed kho bo cag gi rjes su ston pa yin nam ci/ ma smra bar dang / khyed la gnod pa byas sa re zhes de rnams kyis de dag bsdigs pa dang / spa gong
4a3('dul ba): nas dong ste/ yangs pa can du zhugs nas/ lam po che dang / srang dang / bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo dag tu 'phya bar brtsams so// dge slong rnams kyis skabs de thos nas/ bcom
4a4('dul ba): ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ nyes dmigs gang cung zad byung ba ni/ dge slong rnams so phag dag gis lus drud de/ khrus byed pa las gyur gyis//
4a5('dul ba): de lta bas na dge slong gis so phag gis lus drud de khrus mi bya'o// 'drud na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis so phag gis lus drung de khrus mi bya'o zhes
4a6('dul ba): bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong dag rkang pa ser ga byung ni sris dang bcas bzhin bsod snyoms la 'jug pa de dag bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams kyis mthong nas/ smras pa/ 'phags pa dag
4a7('dul ba): khyed zhabs ser ga byung zhing dri ma dang bcas na/ ci ste dri ma sbyang bar mi bgyi/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ bzhin bzang dag bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo // ci 'phags pa khyed dri ma'i
4b1('dul ba): 'dam bcangs pas dag par 'gyur ram/ de rnams cad mi smra bar 'dug ste/ bsod snyoms la brgyus nas/ gtsug lag khang du dong ba dang / skabs de dge slong rnams kyis
4b2('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das la rgyas par gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de ltar na snga ma ni bcas pa'o// 'di ni gnang ba yin te/ de lta bas na dge slong gis rkang pa
4b3('dul ba): so phag gis drud par gnang ngo / / lus gzhan ni ma yin te/ 'drud na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das yangs pa can na spre'u rdzing gi 'gram khang pa brtsegs pa
4b4('dul ba): na bzhugs so/ / dge slong rnams snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos bgos/ lhung bzed thogs te/ yangs pa can du bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs pa dang / de rnams kyis bram ze zhig sa dkar
4b5('dul ba): gyis so ris gsum byugs nas slong mo la rgyu zhing de'i bslangs pa yang mang du rnyed par mthong ngo / / drug sde rnams kyis smras pa/ dga' bo nye dga' bo thabs 'di ni bzang po zhig ste/ bdag
4b6('dul ba): cag kyang de ltar bya'o zhes/ de rnams phyi de nyin sa dkar gyis so ris gsum byugs nas/ bsod snyoms la zhugs pa ma dad pa rnams kyis mthong nas/ 'phya zhing gus par smra'o// gus par
4b7('dul ba): smra'o zhes smras pa dang / drug sde rnams kyis smras pa/ bkren pa khyed kyis gus par smra bar bya ba gang dag yin pa dang / phyag bya ba gang dag yin pa 'di yang mi shes sam/ de dag gis smras
5a1('dul ba): pa/ 'di la ci zhig 'tshal bar bgyi/ bram ze rgan pa rgan pa rnams ni gus par smra bar bya ba yin la/ dge slong rnams ni phyag bya ba yin na/ de ci'i phyir khyed dge
5a2('dul ba): slong rnams la gus par smra ba byed kyi phyag ma yin/ 'phags pa bdag cag gis khyed bram ze lags par 'tshal gyi dge slong du ni ma lags so// de lha lags pas bdag cag gis ma 'tshal gyis
5a3('dul ba): bzod par gsol lo zhes byas pa dang / de dag cang mi smra bar 'dug go/ skabs de dge slong rnams kyis thos nas/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ nyes
5a4('dul ba): dmigs gang cung zad ci byung ba ni/ dge slong rnams so res gsum 'dri ba las gyur gyis/ de lta bas na dge slong gis so ris gsum bri bar mi bya'o// dge slong so ris gsum 'drin 'gal tshabs
5a5('dul ba): can du 'gyur ro/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis so ris gsum mi byug go zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong dag sman pas bsgo yang lus sas mi skud pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis
5a6('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de ltar na snga ma ni bcas pa'o// 'di ni gnang ba yin te/ de lta bas na sman pas bsgo ba ni ma gtogs
5a7('dul ba): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ / drug sde rnams snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos bgos/
5b1('dul ba): lhung bzed thogs te/ mnyan yod du bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs pa na/ de rnams kyis bram ze 'gi'u wang gi thig le byas pa zhig skye bo phal po che'i tshogs kyis bskor zhing sgron mo'i bsngags pa brjod
5b2('dul ba): pa mthong ba dang / de rnams kyis smras pa/ dga' bo nya dga' bo thabs 'di ni bzang po zhig ste/ bdag cag kyang 'di ltar bya'o// legs kyis de ltar bya'o zhes de rnams phyi de nyin 'gi'u wang gi thig le
5b3('dul ba): dag gis bdag nyid brgyan pa byas nas/ bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang / bram ze dang khyim bdag dag gis mthong nas/ 'phya zhing gus par smra'o// gus par smra'o zhes smras pa dang / drug sde rnams
5b4('dul ba): kyis smras pa/ bkren pa khyed kyis gus par smra bar bya ba gang dag yin pa dang / phyag bya ba gang dag yin pa 'di yang mi shes sam/ de dag gis smras pa/ 'di la ci zhig 'tshal bar bgyi/
5b5('dul ba): bram ze rgan pa rgan pa rnams ni gus par smra bar bya ba yi na la/ dge slong rnams ni phyag bya ba yin na/ de ci'i phyir khyed dge slong rnams la gus par smra ba byed kyi/ phyag ma yin/ 'phags pa
5b6('dul ba): dag bdag cag gis khyed bram ze lags par 'tshal gyi/ dge slong du ni ma lags so// de'i slad du bdag cag gis ma 'tshal gyis/ bzod pa gsol lo zhes byas pa dang / de dag cang mi
5b7('dul ba): smra bar 'dug go/ / skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ nyes dmigs gang cung zad ci byung ba ni dge slong dag 'gi'u
6a1('dul ba): wang gi thig le dag gis bdag nyid brgyan pa las gyur gyis/ de lta bas na dge slong gis 'gi'u wang gi thig le dag gis brgyan par mi bya'o// brgyan na 'gal tshabs can du
6a2('dul ba): 'gyur ro/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong gis 'gi'u wang gi thig le dag gis bdag nyid brgyan par mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong zhig dpral bar rma byung ba de sman pa'i drung du song na
6a3('dul ba): bzhin bzangs bdag la sman ston cig/ 'phags pa rma'i thon kor 'gi'u wang gis skus shig dang / khyod 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// des smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo // 'phags
6a4('dul ba): pa khyod kyi ston pa ni thugs rje can yin pas/ gnang bar 'gyur ro// skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas
6a5('dul ba): na dge slong dag sman pas bsgo ba ni ma gtogs so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis so phag gis lus drud par mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong rnams nya phyis kyis 'drud par byed do// /
6a6('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nya phyis kyis drud par mi bya'o// 'drud na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal
6a7('dul ba): mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ / drug sde rnams dris byugs te/ gzhon nu rnams kyi nang du dong nas smras pa/ gzhon du dag nged kyi dri ji lta snoms shig/ de dag gis smras
6b1('dul ba): pa/ gnas brtan ci khyed dris byugs sam/ byugs so// gnas brtan khyed dris byug tu rung ngam/ rung yang rung / mi rung yang rung ste/ nged kyis ni byugs so// de dag 'phya sprod kha zer ba'i
6b2('dul ba): skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ nyes dmigs gang cung zad ci byung ba ni dris nyug pa las gyur gyis/ de lta bas
6b3('dul ba): na dge slong rnams kyis dri byug par mi bya'o/ / nyug na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong rnams kyis dri byug par mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong nad
6b4('dul ba): pa zhig sman pa'i drung du song ste/ bzhin bzangs padag la sman ston cig/ des smras pa/ 'phags pa dris byugs na khyod 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// bzhin bzangs ci kho bo 'dod pa spyod dam/ 'phags
6b5('dul ba): pa khyod kyi sman ni 'di yin te/ gzhan gyis ni 'tsho bar mi nus so// skabs dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na
6b6('dul ba): gnang gis/ sman pa'i lung gis dri bcang bar bya'o// dge slong dag dris byugs nas dge 'dun gyi nang na 'dug cing / bram ze dang khyim bdag 'ongs shing lhags pa rnams la/ chos ston par byed/ bram ze
6b7('dul ba): dang khyim bdag gi khyim rnams su yang 'gro bar byed pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ngas dge slong
7a1('dul ba): dri 'chang ba'i kun tu spyad pa'i chos bca' bar bya ste/ dge slong dri 'chang bas dris byugs nas dge 'dun gyi nang du 'dug par mi bya/ bram ze dang khyim bdag 'ongs shing lhags
7a2('dul ba): pa rnams la chos bstan par mi bya/ bram ze dang khyim bdag gi khyims rnams su 'gro bar mi bya'i/ nam sos par gyur pa de'i tshe khrus byas nas dri ma med par gyur pa dang / dge 'dun gyi nang du 'dug
7a3('dul ba): par bya/ bram ze dang khyim bdag 'ongs shing lhags pa rnams la chos bstan par bya/ bram ze dang khyim bdag gi khyim rnams su 'gro bar bya'o// dge slong dri 'chang bas kun tu spyad pa'i chos ji ltar
7a4('dul ba): bcas pa bzhin yang dag par blangs te/ ma 'dug na/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can dag dge slong rnams la dri 'bul ba na/ dge slong rnams 'gyod nas mi len
7a5('dul ba): pa dang / de dag gis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung bar ma gyur pa de'i tshe na/ mu stegs can rnams yon gnas lags/ da ni bcom ldan 'das
7a6('dul ba): 'jig rten du byung bas/ da ltar khyed yon gnas lags na/ gal te khyed kyis ma bzhes na ci bdag cag 'jig rten 'di nas 'jig rten pha rol tu dge ba'i lam brgyags ma mchis mchi'am/ bdag
7a7('dul ba): cag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du bzhes shig/ de dag gis smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das la zhu'o// skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
7b1('dul ba): kyis bka' stsal pa/ blang bar bya'o// dge slong rnams kyis blangs nas de dag nyid kyi mdun du bor bar dang / de dag gis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag bdag cag gis ring thang bzhin du lce kon khyed
7b2('dul ba): kyis blangs te dor ram/ skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ blangs nas dor bar mi bya'i/ 'on kyang de bzhin/
7b3('dul ba): gshegs pa'i mchod rten la dri'i lag ris byug par bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong rnams kyis blangs nas/ dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten dag la dri'i lag ris nyug go// de dag gis
7b4('dul ba): smras pa/ 'phags pa dag ci bdag cag gis mchod rten ma mthong ngam/ bdag cag gis ni khyed kho na la phul te/ dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten dag la ni sngar phul lags so// skabs de dge
7b5('dul ba): slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ blangs nas gnas khang la byug par bya'o// de rnams kyis gnas khang gi sgo la byugs pa dang /
7b6('dul ba): de dag dri gtsang khang yin no snyam nas phyag 'tshal bar byed pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nang du byug par
7b7('dul ba): bya'o/ / dge slong rnams kyis drang thad du thugs pa dang / nyes dmigs de nyid du gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sngas dang nye ba 'am rkang pa la nye bar byug par bya zhing
8a1('dul ba): zhim po thams cad mig la phan pas dus dus su bsnam par bya ste/ 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chu srin byis pa bsod kyi ri la
8a2('dul ba): 'jigs 'jigs lha'i tshal ri dgas kyi nags na bzhugs so/ / ji tsam na rgyal bu gzhon nu rtogs byed kyis khang bzangs pad+ma ris byed du bcug nas/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas
8a3('dul ba): pa gdugs tshod la spyan drangs te/ bcom ldan 'das khang bzangs pad+ma'i ris su dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa la bzhugs so// nye dga' bo zan za ba'i tshe lag pas ka ba la bsnun
8a4('dul ba): pa dang / khang bzangs pad+ma ris g.yos par gyur to// 'drim mkhan rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa rgyal bu rtogs byed kyis khang bzangs pad+ma ris tshon brgya rtsa gcig gis bkra bar byas pa khyod
8a5('dul ba): kyis gzhig gam ci/ nye dga' bos smras pa/ bkren pa rtogs byed 'di la lhag par chags pas dus byas nas gar skye gtol med do// khyed kyang 'di la lhag par chags pas dus byas nas yi dgas
8a6('dul ba): lba ba can rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/ / de dag kha zer ba'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ nyes dmigs gang
8a7('dul ba): cung zad byung ba ni dge slong dag ka ba la lag pas bsnun pa las gyur gyis/ de lta bas na dge slong gis lag pas ka ba la bsnun par mi bya'o// bsnun na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// bcom
8b1('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis ka ba la lag pas bsnun par mi bya zhes bka' stsal pa dang / drug snga rnams khu tshur dang / gru mo dang / phrag pa dang / mgo dang / rtsig logs dang / rgyab dang /
8b2('dul ba): sked pa dang / brla dang / pus mo dang / byin pa dang / rkang pa dang / dbyug pa dang / bong ba dang / gzhan gyis snun par byed pa nyes dmigs de nyid du gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
8b3('dul ba): sprul pa/ gang gis kyang bsnun par mi bya'o// drug sde rnams rtsig pa dang / sa dang / gzhan la snun par byed pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gzhan la yang gang dag gis
8b4('dul ba): bstan par mi bya'o/ / snyun na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs
8b5('dul ba): so/ / drug sde rnams snga dro mnyan yod du bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs pa dang / de rnams kyis bram ze zhig tshangs pa'i skud pa thogs te/ slong mo la rgyu zhing / des bza' ba da ca' ba yang mang du rnyed pa mthong na/
8b6('dul ba): drug sde rnams kyis smras pa/ dga' bo nye dga' bo thabs 'di ni bzang po zhig ste/ bdag cag kyang de lta bu bya'o zhes de dag phyi de nyin tshangs pa'i skud pa thogs te/ bsod snyoms la zhugs pa
8b7('dul ba): ma dad pa rnams kyis mthong nas/ 'phya zhing gus par smra'o gus par smra'o zhes smras pa dang / drug sde rnams kyis smras pa/ bkren pa khyed kyis gus par smra bar bya ba gang dag yin pa dang /
9a1('dul ba): phyag bya ba gang dag yin pa 'di yang mi shes sam/ de dag gis smras pa/ 'di la ci zhig 'tshal bar bgyi/ bram ze rgan pa rgan pa rnams ni gus par smra bar bya ba yin la/
9a2('dul ba): dge slong rnams ni phyag bya ba yin na/ de ci'i phyir khyed dge slong rnams la gus par smra bar byed kyi/ phyag ma yin/ 'phags pa dag bdag cag gis khyed bram ze lags par 'tshal gyi/ dge slong du ni
9a3('dul ba): ma lagaso/ / de lha lags pas/ bdag cag gis ma 'tshal gyis/ bzod par gsol lo zhes byas pa dang / de dag cang mi smra bar 'dug go/ skabs de dge slong rnams kyis thos nas/ bcom
9a4('dul ba): ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ nyes dmigs gang cung zad ci byung ba ni dge slong rnams tshangs pa'i skud pa thogs pa las gyur gyis/ de lta bas na dge slong gis
9a5('dul ba): tshangs pa'i skud pa gdags par mi bya'o/ / 'dogs na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun
9a6('dul ba): dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ / drug sde rnams snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos bgos/ lhung bzed thogs te/ mnyan yod du bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs pa na/ de dag gis bram ze dri dang me tog
9a7('dul ba): gis brgyan pa/ tshon sna lnga pa'i skud pas lag pa bcings pa zhig dus ston zos nas dbang po tshim ste/ khyim nas byung ba mthong ba dang / de dag gis smras pa/ dga' bo nye dga' bo thabs
9b1('dul ba): 'di ni bzang po zhig ste/ bdag cag kyang 'di bzhin bya'o zhes/ de dag phyi de nyin tshon sna lnga pa'i skud pas lag pa bcings nas/ bsod snyoms la zhugs pa/ bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams
9b2('dul ba): kyis mthong nas/ 'phya zhing gus par smra'o gus par smra'o zhes smras pa dang / drug sde rnams kyis smras pa/ bkren pa khyed kyis gus par smra bar bya ba gang dag yin pa dang / phyag bya ba gang drug yin
9b3('dul ba): pa 'di yang mi shes sam/ de dag gis smras pa/ 'di la ci zhig 'tshal bar bgyi/ bram ze rgan pa rgan pa rnams ni gus par smra bar bya ba yin la/ dge slong rnams ni phyag bya ba yin na/ de ci'i phyir
9b4('dul ba): khyed dge slong rnams la gus par smra bar byed kyi/ phyag ma yin/ 'phags pa dag bdag cag gis khyed bram ze lags par 'tshal gyi/ dge slong du ni ma lags so// de lha lags pas/ bdag
9b5('dul ba): cag gis ma 'tshal gyis/ bzod par gsol lo zhes byas pa dang / de dag cang mi smra bar 'dug go// skabs de dge slong rnams kyis thos nas/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'dra
9b6('dul ba): kyis dgongs pa/ nyes dmigs gang cung zad ci byung ba ni dge slong rnams tshon sna lnga pa'i skud pas lag pa 'ching ba las gyur gyis/ de lta bas na dge slong gis tshon sa lnga pa'i skud pas lag pa bcing bar mi//
9b7('dul ba): bya'o// 'ching na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis tshon sna lnga pa'i skud pas lag pa bcing bar mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong nad pa gzhan zhig sman pa'i drung du song
10a1('dul ba): ste/ bzhin bzangs kho bo la nad 'di lta bu byung na sman ston cig ces byas pa dang / des smras pa/ 'phags pa skud pa la gsang sngags dag gis bzlas brjod byas te/ lag
10a2('dul ba): pab la bcings na khyod 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ / des smras pa/ bzhin bzangs bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo // 'phags pa khyod kyi ston pa ni thugs rje can yin pas/ gnang bar 'gyur ro// skabs de
10a3('dul ba): dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na gnang gis/ sman pa'i lung gis skud pa bcang bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das
10a4('dul ba): kyis sman pa'i lung gis skud pa bcang bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong rnams lag pa g.yas pa'i rtse mo la 'ching ste/ nyes dmigs de nyid du gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
10a5('dul ba): bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag lag pa g.yas pa'i rtse mo la bcing bar mi bya'o// de rnams lag pa g.yas pa'i dpung pa la 'ching ste/ nyes dmigs de nyid du gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
10a6('dul ba): bka' stsal pa/ lag pa g.yas pa'i dpung pa la bcing bar mi bya'o// de rnams lag pa g.yon pa'i rtse mo la 'ching ste/ nyes dmigs de nyid du gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
10a7('dul ba): lag pa g.yon pa'i rtse mo la bcing bar mi bya'i/ 'on kyang lag pa g.yon pa'i dpung pa la bcing bar bya'o// dge slong rnams nad sos par gyur nas/ skud pa bab bab tu 'dor ba mi ma yin pa
10b1('dul ba): rnams 'phya ste/ 'phags pa dag nged kyis sos par byas na/ dam gus par byed pa lha/ skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis
10b2('dul ba): bka' stsal pa/ bab bab tu dor bar mi bya ste/ gal te nad ma byang na chos gos kyi mtha' 'am/ rgya cang la bcing bar bya'o// 'on te thams cad kyi thams cad du sos par gyur nas/ ka ba
10b3('dul ba): ser ga 'am/ rtsig pa'i gseb tu gzhug par bya'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs
10b4('dul ba): so/ / drug sde rnams snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos bgos/ lhung bzed thogs te/ mnyan yod du bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs pa na/ bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyi rgyan slo ma'i nang du
10b5('dul ba): gzhag pa/ drug sde rnams kyis rkang rgyan dang lag rgyan dag thogs nas smras pa/ dga' bo nye dga' bo/ ji ltar mdzes sam/ bram ze dang khyim bdag gis smras pa/ 'phags pa khyed mgo ni phyi/
10b6('dul ba): mtshan khung ni spu na 'di la lus mdzes pa ci zhig yod/ gdon mi za bar dge sbyong khyed 'dod pa'i yon tan dag gis gzir bar gyur to zhes byas pa dang / de rnams cad mi smra bar 'dug go// skabs de
10b7('dul ba): dge slong rnams kyis zos nas/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ nyes dmigs gang cung zad ci byung ba ni/ dge slong rnams lag rgyan dang rkang rgyan dag
11a1('dul ba): gis bdag nyid brgyan pa las gyur gyis/ de lta bas na dge slong gis phag rgyan dang rkang rgyan gyis bdag nyid brgyan par mi bya'o// brgyan na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro//
11a2('dul ba): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// gtsug lag khang du ma byin par len pa rnams kyis/ dge 'dun
11a3('dul ba): gyi mdzod dang / gang zag gis gnas khang dag nas brkus so// dge slong gzhan dag cig gi yang stor na/ bdag cag gi stor nas ji tsam lon pa ma tshor ro// skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom
11a4('dul ba): ldan 'das pa gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na gnang gis/ rgya bcang bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis rgya bcang bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang / drug
11a5('dul ba): sde rnams kyis gser dang / dngul dang / bai DUr+ya dang / shel las byas pa dang / sor gdub rgya rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa dag bcangs so// de nas bram ze dang khyim bdag mthong nas/ lag
11a6('dul ba): pa brkyang ste smras pa/ bzhin bzangs nad med cig/ nad med cig/ de dag gis smras pa/ 'phags pa 'di ci lags/ bzhin bzangs bcom ldan 'das kyis rgya gnang ngo // de dag 'phya smod kha zer zhing //
11a7('dul ba): dge sbyong shAkya'i bu rnams kyi dge sbyong gi tshul nyams shing tshangs pa'i tshul nyams te/ 'di na da ltar rgyal tha snyad 'dogs shing / rgyan rnams kyis bdag nyid brgyan par byed do// skabs de dge
11b1('dul ba): slong rnams kyis thos nas/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong gis gser dang / dngul dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / shel las byas pa'i rgya bcang
11b2('dul ba): bar mi bya/ sor gdub rgya yang bcang bar mi bya'i/ 'on kyang rgya lnga po ra gan dang / zangs las byas pa dang / 'khar ba las byas pa dang / ba so las byas pa dang / ra las byas pa bcang
11b3('dul ba): bar bya'o/ / drug sde rnams kyis rgya la skyes pa dang bud med nyal po byed pa bris pa dang / bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa ci dge sbyong khyod 'dod pa'i yon tan dag gis
11b4('dul ba): gzir ram/ gnas skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgya ni gnyis te/ dge 'dun gyi dang / gang zag gi'o//
11b5('dul ba): del dge 'dun gyi ni dbus su 'khor lo bris na/ glo gnyis su ri dgas/ 'og tu gtsug lag khang gi bdag po'i ming bri bar bya'o// gang zag gi ni rus pa'i keng rus sam/ mgo'i thod pa bri bar
11b6('dul ba): bya'o/ / nyasdom ni/ sen mo 'dreg dang byi dor dang // a mra dang ni skyu ru ra// lhung bzed brgyad po bkag pa dang // rjes su gnang ba gnyis yin no// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
11b7('dul ba): rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na btsugs so/ / gang gi tshe khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis/ sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la/ rgyal bu rgyal
12a1('dul ba): byed kyi tshal phul ba de'i tshe/ des 'dreg mkhan gyi mi la smras pa/ kye skyes bu rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du song la/ 'phags pa rnams kyi skra dang kha spu bregs shig/ de rgyal bu
12a2('dul ba): rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ba dang / drug sde rnams kyi kun tu spyod pa ni/ drug sde gang yang rung ba zhig gis rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi sgo mi stongs pa yin te/ tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' bo rgyal bu rgyal byed
12a3('dul ba): kyi tshal na 'chags cing 'dug pa des/ de rgyang ring po nas mthong nas smras pa/ bzhin bzangs 'ongs pa legs so// 'ongs pa legs so// khyod zla ba lta bur gnas na ring mo zhig lon te/ gang
12a4('dul ba): nas 'ongs/ des smras pa/ 'phags pa khyim bdag gis 'phags pa rnams kyi sgra dang kha spu breg pa'i slad du 'dir btang ngo // des smras pa/ sen mo legs par 'dreg shes sam/ 'phags
12a5('dul ba): pa 'di nyid bdag gi bzo lags so/ / bltas tshur/ de nyid nye bar 'ongs pa dang / nye dga' bos lag pa brkyang ngo // 'dreg mkhan gyis smras pa/ 'phags pa ci 'dra bar breg/ bzhin bzangs
12a6('dul ba): 'bru'i rtse mo lhar bregs shig/ des 'bru'i rtse mo ltar bregs pa dang / des smras pa/ da ni ra ba'i cog lta bu dang / spu gri'i so dang / ste'u ka dang / zla ba tshes pa ltar gyis shig/ des de
12a7('dul ba): ji lta ji ltar bsgo ba de lta de lta bur byas pa dang / 'jug tu smras pa/ bkren pa khyod ko cung zad kyang mi shes pa zhig/ 'di kho na ltar mnyam par gyis la song zhig ces/ des de nyi ma nub kyi bar du
12b1('dul ba): ma btang ngo / / de nyi ma nub nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi drung du song ba dang / mgon med zas sbyin gyis smras pa/ kye skyes bu khyod kyis 'phags pa mang po ji snyed cig gi mgo dang kha
12b2('dul ba): spu bregs/ bdag gis 'phags pa rnams kyi skra dang kha spug la bregs/ dge slong gzu lums can nye dga' bos bdag bskor nas/ sen mo 'bru'i rtse mo dang / ra ba'i cog dang / spu gri'i so dang /
12b3('dul ba): spre'u ka dang / zla ba tshes pa lta bur gyis shig ces pa'i rnam pa thams cad bdag gis bgyis pa dang / de nas 'di skad ces/ bkren pa khyod ko cung zad kyang mi shes pa zhig/ 'di kho na lhar mnyam par
12b4('dul ba): gyis la song zhig ces mchi nas/ da gzod kho na shor na ci zhig bgyi/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba rnams la nye bar zhi ba med pa lha zhes 'phya ba
12b5('dul ba): la zhugs so/ / skabs de dge slong rnams kyis thos nas/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ nyes dmigs gang cung zad ci byung ba ni/ dge slong rnams sen
12b6('dul ba): mo 'dreg pa las gyur gyis/ de lta bas na dge slong gis san mo breg par mi bya'o// 'dreg na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis sen mo breg par mi bya'o zhes bka'
12b7('dul ba): stsal pa dang / dge slong rnams sen mo ring po ring por 'dug pa/ bram ze dang khyim bdag dag gis mthong nas smras pa/ 'phags pa dag ci ste sen mo ring po ring por 'jog bzhin bzangs bcom
13a1('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo / / 'phags pa ci khyed sen mo bcas pas dag par 'gyur ram/ skabs de dge slong rnams kyis thos nas/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa
13a2('dul ba): dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ snga ma ni bcas pa'o// 'di ni gnang ba yin te/ de lta bas na gnang gis/ sen mo rnam pa gnyis po spu gri'i so dang / sne'u ka lha bur breg par
13a3('dul ba): bya'o/ / bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// gang gi tshe khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis/ sangs rgyas
13a4('dul ba): la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la zhes bya ba thams cad de kho na bzhin no/ / khyod sen mo 'tshos shes sam/ 'phags pa ji lta bur bgyi/ ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang /
13a5('dul ba): gser gyi kha dog lha bur gyis shig ces pa'i rnam pa thams cad bdag gis bgyis pa dang / de nas 'di skad ces/ bkren pa khyod ko cung zad kyang mi shes pa zhig/ 'di kho na ltar mnyam par
13a6('dul ba): gyis la song zhig ces mchi nas/ dra gzod kho na shor na ci zhig bgyi/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba rnams la nye bar zhi ba med pa lha
13a7('dul ba): zhes 'bya ba la zhugs so/ / skabs de dge slong rnams kyis thos nas/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ nyes dmigs gang cung zad ci byung ba ni//
13b1('dul ba): dge slong rnams sen mo dag byi dor byed pa las gyur gyis/ de lta bas na dge slong gis sen mo dag byi dor mi bya'o// byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis
13b2('dul ba): sen mo dag byi dor mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong tshon rtsi'i las dang / lhung bzed kyi las byed pa rnams kyi sen mo dri ma chags la/ mdog mi sdug par gyur cing / de rnams sen
13b3('dul ba): mo de 'dra ba kho nar bsod snyoms la 'jug go/ / bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis mthong nas smras pa/ 'phags pa dag khyed ci'i phyir sen mo 'di lta bur dri ma chags shing mdog mi sdug/ de
13b4('dul ba): dag gis bsnyad pa dang / de rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa ci'i phyir dri ma mi dbyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo // 'phags pa khyed ci dri ma'i 'dam bcangs pas 'dag par 'gyur
13b5('dul ba): ram/ skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dri ma dbyi ba'i phyir sen mo bzhar bar bya'o// sangs
13b6('dul ba): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan ta ka gnas pa na bzhugs so/ / rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i kun tu spyod pa ni/ dus kyi gsar thog 'bru sar pa 'am/ 'bras
13b7('dul ba): bu sar pa gang ci yang rung / de dag dang por dge 'dun la 'bul lo// de'i 'og tu bdag nyid za'o// de'i blon po rnams kyis a mra'i shing thog dag phul ba dang / des smras pa/ song la
14a1('dul ba): 'phags pa rnams la phul cig/ de dag gis bgad pa dang / des smras pa/ shes ldan dag cil dgod/ de dag gis smras pa/ lha ci khyed nga ni 'phags pa
14a2('dul ba): rnams la dang por 'bul snyam dgongs kyi/ bdag cag gis ches sngar 'phags pa rnams la phul bar ni ma lags sam/ des smras pa/ gal te de lta na ngas 'phags pa rnams la stong gi
14a3('dul ba): kun dga' ra ba nyid phul lo/ / lha legs te/ rjes su yi rang ngo // des phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi phyir stong gi kun dga' ra ba phul nas/ deng dus skyon kyang btsugs so// de rdzi
14a4('dul ba): ltar yul ma ga d+ha na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs dus skyon la lta bar 'ongs pa a mra'i shing thog smin pa rnams kyis tshim par gyur pa de ltar shing thog rgyas par gyur to/ / de dge 'dun la phul lo zhes
14a5('dul ba): dge slong rnams kyis a mra'i 'bras bu dag ma smin pa nyid du zos so/ / ji tsam na mtshams kyi rgyal zhig la a mra dag dgos par gyur nas/ des rgyal po gzugs can snying po la pho nya btang ste/ grogs
14a6('dul ba): po bdag la a mra dag dgos kyis/ bskur ba'i rigs so zhes byas pa dang / des pho nya de la smras pa/ kye skyes bu ngas stong gi kun dga' ra ba de/ 'phags pa'i dge 'dun la phul gyis/ song la
14a7('dul ba): 'phags pa'i dge 'dun rnams la slongs shig/ de 'od ma'i tshal du song ba dang / drug sde rnams kyi kun tu spyod pa ni/ rtag tu kun dga' ra ba'i sgo mi stongs par byed pa yin te/ tshe dang ldan pa nye
14b1('dul ba): dga' bo 'od ma'i tshal gyi sgo na 'chag cing 'dug go/ / de de'i drung du song nas phyag 'tshal te/ des smras pa/ rgyal po che ge mo zhig gis A mra'i chang du khyed kyi thad du btang na/ de'i slad du a mra
14b2('dul ba): dag stsal pa'i rigs so/ / des smras pa/ kye skyes bu song la a mra ji tsam dgos pa de tsam long zhig/ de song nas a mra'i shing rnams kyi drung du bltas na mi snang ste/ de slar log nas smras pa/
14b3('dul ba): 'phags pa ma mchis so// nye dga' bos de khrid nas kun dga'i ra bar zhugs te/ kun dga'i ra ba thams cad bskor nas smras pa/ kye skyes bu shing 'di la 'dzegs shig/ des 'dzegs na ma
14b4('dul ba): mthong ba dang / nye dga' bos smras pa/ kye skyes bu shar gyi yal gar song / lho dang nub kyi yal gar song / de thams cad du song nas skyo bar gyur te babs nas smras pa/ 'phags pa ci kun
14b5('dul ba): dga'i ra ba 'di lo 'di la 'bras bu ma chags sam/ bzhin bzangs ji ltar lo re lo re zhing shing thog yod pa de ltar 'di 'bras bu chags so// 'phags pa ci rlung dang char pas blags sam/ bzhin
14b6('dul ba): bzangs rlung dang char pas ma blags kyi/ 'on kyang kho bo cag gis a mra'i 'bras bu dag ma smin pa nyid du 'chos so// de slar log nas/ rgyal po gzugs can snying po la gsol pa/ lha 'phags
14b7('dul ba): pa rnams kyi zhal nas/ kho bo cag gis a mra'i 'bras bu dag ma smin pa nyid du 'chos so zhes gsung ngo // des smras pa/ lags te/ nga la longs spyad pa nyid dgos so zhes byas pa dang /
15a1('dul ba): mi de slar song ngo // ji tsam na dus skyon la bab pa'i tshe/ yul ma ga d+hA na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs 'dus nas/ de dag gis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag ci stong gi
15a2('dul ba): kun dga' ra ba 'di lo 'di la 'bras bu ma chags sam/ bzhin bzangs dag ji ltar lo re lo re zhing shing thog yod pa de ltar 'di 'bras bu chags mod kyi/ 'on kyang kho bo cag gis a mra'i 'bras
15a3('dul ba): bu dag ma smin pa nyid du 'chos so/ / 'phags dag gang na yul ma ga d+ha na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs thams cad a mra sbyin pa dag gis tshim par 'gyur ba de khyed kyis 'bras bu ma smin pa kho nar 'chos te/
15a4('dul ba): gang kho bo cag la gnod pa byas pa ni ma legs pa zhig byas so// des smras pa/ 'di rgyal pos yul ma ga d+ha na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs la byin pa ma yin gyi/ 'on kyang dge slong gi dge 'dun la phul te/
15a5('dul ba): dade lta bas na kho bo cag gis ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin zos so// khyed ci gtogs zhes byas pa dang / de dag 'phya smod kha zer bar byed do// skabs de dge slong rnams kyis thos nas/ bcom ldan 'das la
15a6('dul ba): gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ nyes dmigs gang cung zad ci byung ba ni/ dge slong rnams a mra dag za ba las gyur gyis/ de lta bas na dge slong gis a mra dag bza' bar mi bya'o//
15a7('dul ba): dge slong a mra dag za na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis a mra dag bza' bar mi bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang / bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can dag/ dge slong
15b1('dul ba): rnams la shing sa ha ka ra'i shing thog dag 'bul ba na/ dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo // de dag gis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag gang gi tshe/ sangs rgyas
15b2('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung bar ma gyur pa zhes bya ba nas/ 'jig rten 'di nas 'jig rten pha rol tu 'gro 'am/ bzhes shig ces bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no// skabs de dge sbyong rnams kyis thos
15b3('dul ba): nasabacom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na gnang gis/ mtshan nyid grub pa yin no zhes byas nas bza' bar bya ste/ 'di la 'gyod par mi
15b4('dul ba): bya'o/ / de la mtshan nyid grub pa ni 'di dag yin te/ tshig gu chags pa rnams so// bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can gzhan dag cig/ dge slong rnams la a mra'i shing thog smin pa
15b5('dul ba): dag 'bul ba na zhes bya ba nas/ de bzhin du 'jig rten 'di nas 'jig rten pha rol tu mchi'am/ bzhes shig ces bya ba'i bar thams cad snga ma bzhin no// skabs de dge slong rnams kyis//
15b6('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na gnang gis/ mtshan nyid bye brag phyed do zhes byas te bza' bar bya'o// de la mtshan nyid bye brag
15b7('dul ba): byed pa ni 'di dag yin te/ sha zhugs pa rnams so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so//
16a1('dul ba): mnyan yod na dge slong nad pa zhig sman pa'i drung du song ste/ bzhin bzangs bdag 'di 'dra ba'i nad kyis thebs na/ sman ston cig/ des smras pa/ 'phags pa rje
16a2('dul ba): mar 'thung la snum par gyis shig dang / bkru sman sbyin no// des mar 'thungs pa dang / skom pas gnod par gyur to// sman pa 'ongs te dris pa/ 'phags pa bde bar 'dug gam
16a3('dul ba): des smras pa/ bzhin bzangs bdag skom pas gnod do// skyu ru ra chongs shig ces byas pa dang / des lag tu blangs te 'dug go/ yang sman pas dris pa/ 'phags pa skom pa dang
16a4('dul ba): bral lam/ des smras pa/ bzhin bzangs ma bral lo// smon pas smras pa/ 'phags pa de'i tshe skyu ru nA ma bcangs sam/ bzhin bzangs yod de 'di yin no// 'phags pa khar chongs
16a5('dul ba): shig/ bzhin bzangs bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo // 'phags pa khyod kyi ston pa ni thugs rje can yin pas gnang bar 'gyur ro// skabs de zhes bya ba nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
16a6('dul ba): bka' stsal pa/ khar bcang ba'i bar du zhes bya ba'i bar du'o// des khar bcug nas 'dug go// yang sman pa de 'ongs nas dris pa/ 'phags pa skom pa dang bral lam/ des smras pa/ bzhin
16a7('dul ba): bzangs da dung ma bral lo/ / sman pas smras pa/ 'phags pa de'i tshe skyu ru ra khar ma bcangs sam/ bzhin bzangs bcangs te 'dug pa 'di yin no// des smras pa/ 'phags pa mur cig/
16b1('dul ba): gzhan du na skom pa dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro// des smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo // 'phags pa khyod kyi ston pa ni thugs rje can yin pas gnang bar 'gyur ro// skabs de
16b2('dul ba): dge slong rnams kyis thos nas/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mur bar bya'o// mur mur nas bor gyis/ ma med pa dang / skom pas je gnod
16b3('dul ba): par gyur to/ / yang sman pa 'ongs nas dris pa/ 'phags pa skom pa dang bral lam/ des smras pa/ bzhin bzangs shin tu gnod do// 'phags pa de'i tshe skyu ru ram mur ram/ bzhin bzangs
16b4('dul ba): myumumyur nas bor ro/ / 'phags pa ci'i phyir ma mid/ bzhin bzangs bcom ldan 'das kyis dus ma yin pa'i zas bkag go/ 'phags pa khyod ni nad pa yin la/ khyod kyi ston pa ni thugs rje can
16b5('dul ba): yin pas gnang bar 'gyur ro/ / skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na dge slong dag gnang gis/ 'bras
16b6('dul ba): bu lnga dus su yang rung / dus ma yin par yang rung / nad pa yang rung / mi na bas kyang rung / bza' bar bya ste/ 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis 'bras bu lnga dus su yang
16b7('dul ba): rung / dus ma yin par yang rung / nad pa yang rung / mi na bas kyang rung ste/ bza' bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang / dge slong rnams kyis 'bras bu lnga gang dag yin pa mi shes pa dang /
17a1('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skyu ru ra dang / a ru dang / ba ru ra dang / pi pi ling dang / na le zham mo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
17a2('dul ba): rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan ta ka gnas pa na bzhugs so/ / rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer na khyim bdag shin tu bzang po zhes bya ba phyug cing nor mang ba longs spyod chen po zhig gnas
17a3('dul ba): pa de gcer bu pa rnams la rab tu dad do/ / des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/ de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' dgur spyod par byed do// de rtse bar
17a4('dul ba): byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' dgur spyod par byed pa las/ dus gzhan zhig na chung ma sems can zhugs par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyang snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos mnabs/
17a5('dul ba): lhung bzed bsnams te/ rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs nas/ rgyal po'i khab na bsod snyoms la rgyu zhing / khyim bdag shin tu bzang po'i khyim ga la ba de logs su gshegs
17a6('dul ba): pa dang / khyim bdag shin tu bzang pos bcom ldan 'das rgyang ma nas mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang chung ma khrid nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di
17a7('dul ba): skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag gi mchis brang 'di sems can zhugs par gyur na/ ci zhig tu btsa' bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bu por btsa'
17b1('dul ba): bar 'gyur zhing / rigs gsal bar byed par 'gyur/ lha dang mi'i dpal nyams su myong bar 'gyur/ nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/ dgra bcom pa nyid
17b2('dul ba): mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ro/ / des bcom ldan 'das la bza' ba dang bca' ba gtsang zhing bsod pa lhung bzed bkang ste phul ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis nad med cig ces gsungs nas/
17b3('dul ba): bsod snyoms pazhes te gshegs so// de dang ha cang mi ring ba zhig na gcer bu pa zhig 'dug pa des bsams pa/ gang bdag cag la bslang ba'i khyim gcig pu zhig yod pa de yang / dge sbyong go'u
17b4('dul ba): ta mas kha drangs kyis/ song la dge sbyong go'u ta mas ci lung bstan pa lha'o snyam mo// de der song ste smras pa/ khyim bdag dge sbyong go'u ta ma 'ongs par gyur tam/ byon to// des ci zhig lung
17b5('dul ba): bstan/ 'phags pa bdag gis de la chung ma bstan te/ ci zhig btsa' bar 'gyur zhes bgyis pa dang / de bu phor btsa' bar 'gyur zhing / rigs gsal bar byed par 'gyur/ lha dang ma'i
17b6('dul ba): dpal nyams su myong bar 'gyur/ nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ro zhes gsung ngo // gcer bu pa de rtsis
17b7('dul ba): mkhas pa zhig s+ye/ rdo rgyus kha dog dkar po blangs nas brtsis pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad lung bstan pa de thams cad de kho na bzhin du mthong nas/ des bsams pa/ gal
18a1('dul ba): te rjes su bsngags na ni khyim bdag 'di dge sbyong go'u ta ma la dad par 'ong bas/ de bas na 'di cung zad cig ni bsngags par bya/ cung zad cig ni smad par bya'o/
18a2('dul ba): snyam du bsams nas/ lag pa kyogs/ bzhin bsgyur ba dang / khyim bdag shin tu bzang pos smras pa/ 'phags pa ci ste lag pa kyog/ bzhin bsgyur/ des smras pa/ khyim bdag
18a3('dul ba): 'di la cung zad cig ni bden/ cung zad cig ni brdzun no// 'phags pa gang ni bden/ gang ni brdzun/ khyim bdag bu phor btsa' bar 'gyur ro zhes zer ba gang yin pa de ni bden no// rigs
18a4('dul ba): gsal bar byed par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba gang yin pa de ni bden na/ gsal ba ni me'i ming yin pas/ sems can skal ba chung ngu de btsas ma thag kho nar khyim mes tshig par 'gyur ro// wA
18a5('dul ba): dang mi'i dpal nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro zhes zer ba gang yin pa de ni brdzun te/ khyim bdag khyod kyis mir gyur pa lha dang mi'i dpal nyams su myong bar gyur pa 'ga' yod pa lha mthong ngam/ nga'i
18a6('dul ba): bstan pa la rab tu 'byung ngo zhes zer ba de bden te/ gang gi tshe 'di bza' ba yang med/ bgo ba yang med pa de'i tshe gdon mi za bar dge sbyong go'u ta ma'i thad du rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro// nyon mongs
18a7('dul ba): pa thams cad spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ro zhes zer ba gang yin pa de ni brdzun te/ re zhig dge sbyong go'u ta ma la yang nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pa'i
18b1('dul ba): dgra bcom pa nyid med na/ de'i nyan thos la lha smos kyang ci dgos/ khyim bdag shin tu bzang po mi dga' bar gyur nas smras pa/ 'phags pa 'di la bdag gis ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi
18b2('dul ba): gcer bu pas smras pa/ khyim bdag bdag cag ni rab tu byung ba ste/ bslab pa blangs pa yin pas/ khyod nyid shes so zhes smras nas song ngo // shin tu bzang pos bsams pa/
18b3('dul ba): 'di yod dor ro snyam nas/ sman ma yin pa sbyin par brtsams pa dang / sems can de srid pa tha ma pa zhig pas/ sman ma yin pa de yang de la sman du gyur/ des de'i dku g.yon pa ma
18b4('dul ba): bar brtsams pa dang / mngal na 'dug pa de dku g.yas par song ngo // shin tu bzang pos dku g.yas pa mnye bar brtsams pa dang / de dku g.yon par song ste/ srid pa tha ma pa'i sems can
18b5('dul ba): zag pa zad pa ma thob kyi bar du/ bar ma dor rgyun chad cing dus byed par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni/ gnas ma yin zhing go skabs med do// khyim bdag shin tu bzang po'i chung ma de dku ma nyes
18b6('dul ba): pas ngu bar brtsams pa dang / khyim tshes dag gis thos nas/ rings pa rings par song ste dris pa/ shes ldan khyim bdag gi chung ma 'di ci ste du/ shin tu bzang pos smras pa/
18b7('dul ba): gdon mi za ba'i bar 'di bu btsa' ba'i dus la bab bo zhes byas pa dang / de dag dong ngo // shin tu bzang pos bsams pa/ bdag gis 'di 'dir gsad mi nus kyis/ dgon par
19a1('dul ba): bkri'o snyam nas/ des de dgon par khrid nas/ ci nas 'chi bar 'gyur ba de lha de ltar brtsal nas/ des de sbas te khyim du khyer nas mdza' bo dang / nye du dang /
19a2('dul ba): phu nu dang / khyim tshes rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan dag kho bo'i chung ma shi'o// de dag gis ngu bar brtsams nas/ de dag ngu zhing / de gos sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po
19a3('dul ba): dang / dkar po rnams kyis khyogs brgyan nas bsil batshal gyi dur khrod du khyer ro// gcer bu pa dag gis thos nas/ de dag dga' mgu rangs nas/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang /
19a4('dul ba): pa dan dag bsgreng ste/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer gyi lam po che dang / srang dang / bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo dag tu rgyu zhing smras pa/ shes ldan dag nyon cig/ dge sbyong go'u ta mas khyim
19a5('dul ba): bdag shin tu bzang po'i chung ma bu por btsa' bar 'gyur zhing / rigs gsal bar byed par 'gyur/ lha dang mi'i dpal nyams su myong bar 'gyur/ nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/ nyon mongs
19a6('dul ba): pa thams cad spangs ste/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa de ni shi nas bsil 'tshal gyi dur khrod du khyer ro// re zhig shing gang la rtsa ba nyid kyang med pa de la/ yal ga/
19a7('dul ba): dang / 'dab ma dang / lo ma 'byung bar lha ga la 'gyur/ skabs 'di lta bu la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mi mkhyen pa ma/ mi gzigs pa 'am/ mi rig pa 'am/ rnam par mi
19b1('dul ba): mkhyen pa cung zad kyang mi mnga' ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po 'jig rten la phan par zhugs pa/ srung ba gcig pu/ gcig tu dpa' ba/ zla med pa/ gnyis su mi gsung
19b2('dul ba): ba/ zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gis gnas pa/ bslab pa gsum la legs par bslabs pa/ 'dul ba'i gzhi gsum la mkhas pa/ chu bo bzhi las brgal ba/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i
19b3('dul ba): zhabs kyi mthil legs par gnas pa/ bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la yun ring po nas goms par mdzad pa/ mi 'jigs pa bzhis mi bsnyengs pa/ yan lag lnga rnam par spangs pa/ 'gro ba
19b4('dul ba): lnga las yang dag par 'das pa/ yan lag drug dang ldan pa/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs pa/ drug la rtag tu gnas pa/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi me tog gis phyug pa/
19b5('dul ba): la yan lag brgyad pa ston pa/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la mkhas pa/ stobs bcu'i stobs mnga' ba/ grags sa phyogs bcur khyab pa/ stong la dbang sgyur bas
19b6('dul ba): khyad par du 'phags pa rnams ni chos nyid kyis nyin lan gsum/ mtshan lan gsum du sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la gzigs shing / su ni nyams/ su ni dar / su ni nyam nga bar gyur/
19b7('dul ba): su ni stobs su chud par gyur/ su ni gnod par gyur/ su ni nyam nga ba dang / stobs su chud pa dang / gnod par gyur/ su ni ngan song la gzhol/ su ni ngan song la 'bab/ su ni ngan song la bab/
20a1('dul ba): gang ni ngan song las drangs nas/ mtho ris dang / thar pa dang / 'bras bu la dgod/ gang zhig gi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par bya/ gang zhig gi bskyed pa ni yongs su smin
20a2('dul ba): par bya/ gang zhig smin pa ni grol bar bya zhes ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go/ yang smras pa/ chu srin gnas kyi rgya mtsho ni// dus rlabs 'da' bar 'gyur srid kyi// gdul bar bya ba'i sras rnams la/
20a3('dul ba): sangs rgyas dus las mi 'da' 'o// ji ltar ma ni sdug pa'i bu gcig la// lta zhing de yi srog kyang srung ba ltar// de bzhin gshegs pa gdul ba'i skye bo la// de bzhin gzigs shing de yi rgyud kyang
20a4('dul ba): srung / / thams cad mkhyen pa'i rgyud la gnas pa yi// thugs rje'i ba drus pa gshin be'u sgor bzhin// srid pa bgrod dka' 'khyams par gyur pa yi// gdul ba'i sras rnams skyo mo mkhyen
20a5('dul ba): bar tshol/ / / bam po gnyis pa/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyogs shig tu mdzum pa mdzad do// chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe sangs rgyas
20a6('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das rnams 'dzum pa mdzad pa de'i tshe/ zhal nas 'od gzer sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dag byung nas/ kha cig ni 'og tu 'gro/ kha cig ni steng du 'gro /
20a7('dul ba): gang dag 'og shu 'gro de dag ni dmyal ba yang sos dang / thig nag dang / bsdus gzhom dang / ngu 'bod dang / ngu 'bod chen po dang / tsha ba dang / rab tu tsha ba dang / mnar med pa dang / chu bu
20b1('dul ba): can dang / chu bur rdob dang / so thams thams dang / kyi hud zer ba dang / a chu zer ba dang / ut+pa ba lhar gas pa dang / pad+ma ltar gas pa dang / pad+ma ltar gas pa chen por song ste/ tsha ba'i
20b2('dul ba): dmyal pa gang dag yin pa de dag tu ni bsil bar gyur nas 'bab/ grang ba'i dmyal ba gang dag yin pa de dag tu ni dro bar gyur nas 'bab bo// des sems can de rnams kyi sdug bsngal gyi khyad par rgyun bcad
20b3('dul ba): pa dang / de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ shes ldan ci bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos sam/ 'on te gzhan du skyes zhes zer ro// de dag dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das sprul pa gtong ste/ de
20b4('dul ba): ngag gis sprub pa de mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems shing / shes ldan dag bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos pa yang ma yin/ gzhan du skyes pa yang ma yin gyi/ 'on kyang sems can 'di sngon ma mthong
20b5('dul ba): ba zhig ste/ 'di'i mthus bdag cag sdug bsngal gyi khyad par rgyun chad do zhes zer ro// de dag sprul pa de la sems mngon par dang bas dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las de zad par byas nas/ gang du sems
20b6('dul ba): can rnams snod du 'gyur ba lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du nying mtshams sbyor ba 'dzin to/ / gang dag steng du 'gro ba de dag ni rgyal chen bzhi'i lha dang / sum cu rtsa gsum dang / 'thab bral dang / dga' ldan dang /
20b7('dul ba): 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangs ris dang / tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don dang / tshangs chen dang / 'od chung dang / tshad med 'od dang / 'od gsal dang / dge chung dang / tshad
21a1('dul ba): med dge dang / dge rgyas dang / sprin med dang / bsod nams 'phel dang / 'bras bu che dang / mi che ba dang / mi gdung ba dang / gya nom snang dang / shin tu mthong dang /
21a2('dul ba): shin tu mthong dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi nang du song nas/ mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa dang / bdag med pa zhes bya ba yang sgrags so// tshigs bcad gnyis kyang sgrogs te//
21a3('dul ba): brtsam par bya zhing 'byung bar bya// sangs rgyas bstan la 'bad par bya// 'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin// 'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par bya// chos 'dul 'di la gang zhig ni// bag dang bcas
21a4('dul ba): par spyod byed pa/ / skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas// sdug bsngal gyi ni mthar byed 'gyur// de nas 'od gzar de dag stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bskor nas/ bcom ldan 'das
21a5('dul ba): nyid kyi phyi bzhin phyi bzhin 'brang zhing 'gro ste/ de gal te bcom ldan 'das las/ 'das pa lung bstan par bzhed na ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs su nub par 'gyur ro// ma 'ongs pa lung ston
21a6('dul ba): bar bzhed na ni/ mdun du nub par 'gyur ro// dmyal bar skye ba lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi mthil du nub par 'gyur ro// dud 'gror skye ba lung ston par bzhed na ni/ long mor nub par 'gyur ro//
21a7('dul ba): yi dgas su skye ba lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi mthe bor nub par 'gyur ro// mir skye ba lung ston par bzhed na ni/ pus mor nub par 'gyur ro// stobs kyis 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal srid lung
21b1('dul ba): ston par bzhed na ni/ phyag g.yon gyi mthil du nub par 'gyur ro// 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid lung ston par bzhed na ni/ phyag g.yas kyi mthil du nub par 'gyur ro// lhar skye ba lung ston par bzhed
21b2('dul ba): na ni/ lte bar nub par 'gyur ro// nyan thos kyi byang chub lung ston par bzhed na no// zhal du nub par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub lung ston par bzhed na ni/ mdzod spur nub par 'gyur
21b3('dul ba): ro/ / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub lung ston par bzhed na ni/ gtsug tor du nub par 'gyur ro// de nas 'od gzer de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
21b4('dul ba): bskor nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du nub bo// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa
21b5('dul ba): rnam pa sna tshogs tshon ni stong dag gis/ / bkra ba'i tshogs dag zhal gyi nang nas byung // nyi ma shar bar gyur pa ji lta bar// de yis phyogs rnams kun tu snang bar bgyis// tshigs su bcad de yang
21b6('dul ba): gsol pa/ sangs rgyas rgod bral zhum dang rgyags pa spangs// rgyal ba dgra thul 'gro mchog rgyur gyur pa// rgyu ma mchis par pad+ma'i rtsa lag dang // dung ltar dkar ba'i 'dzum pa ston mi mdzad// de ltas
21b7('dul ba): nyid kyi brtan blos dus mkhyen nas/ / rgyal dbang nyan po nyan par 'tshal rnams kyi// the tshom skyes pa thub pa skyes mchog gis// gsung mchog bzang zhing bstan pas bsal du gsol// rdzogs pa'i
22a1('dul ba): sangs rgyas ri rab lhar brtan pa/ / zung thub rnams ni glo bur 'dzum mi ston// mgon po ci slad 'dzum pa mdzad pa de// skye bo'i tshogs 'di nyan par yang dag 'tshal//
22a2('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa
22a3('dul ba): mi mdzad do/ / kun dga' bo song la/ dge slong rnams la dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa dur khrod du rgyu zhing gshegs par bzhed kyis/ khyed las gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pa dang lhan cig dur
22a4('dul ba): khrod du rgyu zhing 'gro bar spro ba de chos gos dag so so nas long zhig ces sgo zhig/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos btsun pa de ltar 'tshal lo zhes/ bcom ldan 'das kyi lhar mnyan nas/ dge slong dag
22a5('dul ba): gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ dge slong rnams la dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa dur khrod du rgyu zhing gshegs par bzhed kyis/ khyed las gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pa dang lhan cig dur khrod
22a6('dul ba): du rgyu zhing 'gro bar spro ba de chos gos dag so so nas long zhig ces bsgo ba dang / dge slong thams cad 'dus nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar lhags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das dul ba/ zhi ba/ 'khor
22a7('dul ba): zhi ba grol ba/ 'khor grol ba/ dbugs phyin pa/ 'khor dbugs phyin pa/ rnam par dul ba/ 'khor rnam par dul ba/ dgra bcom pa/ 'khor dgra bcom pa/ 'dod chags dang
22b1('dul ba): bral ba/ 'khor 'dod chags dang bral ba/ mdzes pa/ 'khor mdzes pa/ khyu mchog pa glang gi tshogs kyis bskor ba lha bu dang / glang po che glang po che'i phrug gu'i tshogs kyis bskor ba
22b2('dul ba): lha bu/ seng ge mche ba can gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ ngang pa'i rgyal po ngang pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ nam mkha' lding bya'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ bram ze bram ze'i khye'u'i
22b3('dul ba): tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu dang / sman pa nad pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ dpa' bo dmag mi'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ sa mkhan 'gron pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lha bu/ ded
22b4('dul ba): dpon tshong pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lha bu/ tshong dpon tshong pa'i 'khor gyis bskor ba lta bu/ khams kyi rgyal po blon po'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ 'khor los sgyur ba bu stong gis bskor
22b5('dul ba): blta bu/ zla ba skar ma'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ nyi ma 'od gzer skyong gis bskor ba lha bu/ yul 'khor srung dri za'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lha bu/ 'phags skyes po grul bum gyi tshogs
22b6('dul ba): kyis bskor ba lha bu/ mig mi bzang klu'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lha bu/ nor sbyin gnod sbyin gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ thag zangs ris lha ma yin gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ brgya
22b7('dul ba): byin sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lha bu/ tshangs pa tshangs ris pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lha bu/ rgya mtsho mi g.yo ba lha bu/ sprin chu dang bcas pa lha bu/ glang po che'i rgyal
23a1('dul ba): po dregs pa med pa lta bu/ dbang po shin tu dul bas spyod lam mi nyams par gshegs pa/ sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan pa/ dang
23a2('dul ba): byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ sku 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ 'od nyi ma stong bas lhag pa/ rin po che'i ri 'gro ba lta bur kun nas bzang ba/ stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs
23a3('dul ba): pa bzhi dang / ma 'dres pa gsum dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/ nyan thos chen po kun shes ko'u di n+ya dang / rta thul dang / rlangs pa dang / ming chen
23a4('dul ba): dang / bzang po dang / shA ri'i bu dang / mo'u 'gal gyi bu dang / 'od srungs dang / grags pa dang / gang po la sogs pa dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun mang po gzhan dang / srog chags
23a5('dul ba): brgya stong phal mo ches bskor nas bsil tshal gyi dur khrod du gshegs so/ / sangs rgyas gshegs pa la phan yon bco brgyad yod de/ bco brgyad gang zhe na/ me'i 'jigs pa med/ chu'i
23a6('dul ba): 'jigs pa med/ seng ge'i 'jigs pa med/ skyug gi 'jigs pa med/ gzig gi 'jigs pa mad/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyi 'jigs pa med/ rkun po'i 'jigs pa mad
23a7('dul ba): la gtsan pa'i 'jigs pa med/ gru btsas kyi 'jigs pa med/ sho gam gyi 'jigs pa med/ bsel rngan gyi 'jigs pa med/ mi'i 'jigs pa med/ mi ma yin pa'i 'jigs
23b1('dul ba): ba med/ dus dus su gzugs bzang po dag mthong bar 'gyur/ sgra snyan pa dag thos par 'gyur/ 'od chen po dag mthong bar 'gyur/ kun shes pa lung ston pa dag thos par 'gyur/ chos kyi
23b2('dul ba): longs spyod dang / zang zing gi longs spyod dang ldan par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas gshegs pa ni gnod pa chung ba yin pas/ lha dang mi brgya stong du ma/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zha 'a bring du phyi
23b3('dul ba): bzhin 'azang ngo / / bsil ba'i tshal logs nas rlung dag kyang langs so// rgyal rigs kyi khye'u zhig dang / bram ze'i khye'u byis pa gnyis shig rgyal po'i khab nas phyi rol tu byung ste rtse zhing 'khod/
23b4('dul ba): do// de gnyis las rgyal rigs kyi khye'u ni dad pa dang ldan pa yin/ bram ze'i khye'u ni de lha ma yin no// bram ze'i khye'u des/ rgyal rigs kyi khye'u la smras pa/ grogs po bcom ldan 'das
23b5('dul ba): kyis khyim bdag shin tu bzang po'i chung ma'i bu khye'ur skye bar 'gyur te/ rigs 'bar bar 'gyur zhing / lha dang mi'i dpal yang myong bar gyur nas/ nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ste/ nyon
23b6('dul ba): mongs pa thams cad spangs pas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan na/ de ni 'chi ba'i dus byas nas bsil 'tshal gyi dur khrod du khyer na/ bcom ldan 'das
23b7('dul ba): kyis bka' stsal pa brdzun du ma gyur grang / rgyal rigs kyi khye'u des tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/ zla ba skar ma'i tshogs bcas sa la ltung yang srid// sa 'di ri dang nags bcas mkha' la
24a1('dul ba): 'gro yang srid/ / rgya mtsho chen po'i chu ni bskam par 'gyur srid kyi// drang srong chen po brdzun gsung 'gyur ba srid pa min// bram ze'i khye'u des grogs po de lta na bsil tshal
24a2('dul ba): gyikyi dur khrod lta zhing 'dong ngo zhes smras nas/ de gnyis dong ba dang / bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab nas gshegs pa mthong ngo // rgyal rigs kyi khye'us bcom ldan 'das thag ring po kho nas mthong
24a3('dul ba): nas/ yang tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/ thub pa the tshom bral zhing rgod pa mi mnga' ba// ri dgas rgyal po lta bu'i sgra skad mchog sgrogs shing // the tshom med par pha rol smra bas mi brdzib//
24a4('dul ba): 'di ltar skye bo'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor zhing gshegs// bsil tshal phyogs su kha ba'i tshogs lha bu'i// bsil ba'i ngad can rlung ni langs par gyur pa na// shAkya thub pa'i rdzu 'phrul
24a5('dul ba): brtag pa'i don gyi phyir/ / lha tshogs mang po gnas nas 'ongs pa nyid du nges// rgyal po gzugs can snying pos/ bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag shin tu bzang po'i chung ma'i bu khye'ur skye bar/
24a6('dul ba): 'gyur te/ rigs 'bar bar 'gyur zhing / lha dang mi'i dpal yang myong bar gyur nas/ nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ste/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum
24a7('dul ba): du byed par 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan na/ de ni 'chi ba'i dus la bab nas bsil tshal gyi dur khrod du phyung zhing / bcom ldan 'das kyang nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu bsil tshal gyi dur
24b1('dul ba): khrod du gshegs so zhes thos so/ / thos nas kyang de 'di snyam du sems te/ bcom ldan 'das ni don med par bsil tshal gyi dur khrod du mi gshegs pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim
24b2('dul ba): bdag shin tu bzang po'i chung ma las brten te/ gdul ba'i don chen po zhig mdzad par 'gyur gor ma chag gis/ bltar 'gro'o snyam nas/ de btsun mo dang / gzhon nu dang / blon po dang
24b3('dul ba): po brang 'khor dang / ljongs kyi mis yongs su bskor nas/ rgyal po'i khab tu song ba dang / rgyal rigs kyi khye'u des/ rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po thag ring po kho na nas mthong
24b4('dul ba): nas/ yang tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/ ma gu d+ha yi mnga' bdag rgyal po'i gtso bo 'di// 'di ltar 'khor bcas rgyal po'i khab nas byung ba las// skye bo'i tshogs kyi 'byor pa phun sum
24b5('dul ba): tshogs par ni/ / bdag gi snying la nges pa'i blo dag skyes par gyur// skye bo'i tshogs rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das mthong nas/ gshegs shul phye ba dang / bcom ldan 'das zhal 'dzum pa mdzad
24b6('dul ba): cing / skye bo rnams kyi gung la bzhugs so// bcom ldan 'das zhal 'dzum pa mdzad pa gcer bu pa dag gis mthong nas bsams pa/ 'di ltar dge sbyong go'u ta ma bzhin 'dzum pa byed cing / skye bo
24b7('dul ba): mang po'i gung la 'dug pa las na/ sems can 'di ma shi bar nges so snyam nas/ des khyim bdag shin tu bzang po la smras pa/ khyim bdag sems can skal pa chung ngu 'di ni ma shi'o//
25a1('dul ba): des smras pa/ 'phags pa de ltar gyur na/ skabs 'di la da ji ltar bsgrub par bya/ des smras pa/ khyim bdag kho bor bslab pa'i gzhi yang dag par blangs pa
25a2('dul ba): yin gyis/ khyod nyid shes par gyis shig/ des bud shing bcer te chung ma'i ro de me'i phung po'i nang du bcug ste bsregs pa dang / de'i lus thams cad tshig na lho'i nye 'khor de bzhin du 'dug
25a3('dul ba): go/ de nas lho'i nye 'khor de rdol nas pad+ma byung ste/ pad+ma de'i snying po las gzhon nu ga zugs bzang ba/ lha na sdug pa/ mdzes pa zhig byung ngo // de srog chags brgya stong dag gis mthong nas/
25a4('dul ba): mchog tu ngo mtshar chen po skyes par gyur pa dang / gcer bu pa dag gi rgyags pa dang / nga rgyal dang / khengs pa dag nyams so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ khyim bdag shin tu bzang
25a5('dul ba): po la bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag gzhon du long zhig/ des gcer bu pa'i gdong du bltas pa dang / des smras pa/ khyim bdag me phung rab tu 'bar ba'i nang du zhugs na thams cad kyi thams
25a6('dul ba): cad du tshig par mi 'gyur ram/ de skad smras pa dang / des ma blangs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ 'tsho byed gzhon nus gsos la bka' stsal pa/ 'tsho byed gzhon nu yong zhig/ des
25a7('dul ba): bsams pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas ma yin/ skabs ma yin par bdag mi bskos kyis/ blang ngo snyam nas/ des the tshom med par me phung gi nang du zhugs nyi blangs so// rgyal
25b1('dul ba): ba'i bka' yis me yi phung por zhugs gyur te/ / de yis gzhon nu me yi nang nas blangs pa na// rgyal ba'i mthu yis me ni zhi ba nyid gyur cing // kha ba'i tshogs lhur bsil ba'ang skad cig de la
25b2('dul ba): byung / / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ 'tsho byed gzhon nus gsos la bka' stsal pa/ 'tsho byed khyod nyams pa'i gnod pa dag tu ma gyur tam/ des gsol pa/ btsun pa bdag rgyal
25b3('dul ba): po'i pho brang du btsas shing / rgyal po'i pho brang du skyes par gyur kyang / 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyi brlabs kyis zhugs kyi phung po tsan danas mchog pa lta bur bsal bar gyur pa 'di lta
25b4('dul ba): bu ni sngon chad ma myong lags so/ / de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis/ khyim bdag shin tu bzang po la bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag gzhon nu 'di long zhig/ de log par lta ba la phyogs pas re zhig
25b5('dul ba): len par mi byed cing / gcer bu pa de nyid kyi gdong du lta bar byed do// des smras pa/ khyim bdag mang du smra ci dgos/ mas ni thams cad 'tshig pa yin na/ gzhon nu shin tu skal ba chung ba
25b6('dul ba): 'di ma tshig pa las na/ 'di khyod kyi khyim du khyer na khyod kyi khyim yang tshig cing / khyod kyi srog gi bar chad du yang 'gyur bar nges so// des bdag las gces pa med do snyam nas/ de ma blangs pa
25b7('dul ba): dang / de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis/ ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po la bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po gzhon nu long zhig/ des gus par sgrim pa dang bcas pas lag pa
26a1('dul ba): brkyang ste/ de blangs nas kun tu brtags te gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das khye'u 'di'i ming cir gdags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen
26a2('dul ba): po khye'u 'di 'di ltar me'i nang nas skyes pas/ de'i phyir khye'u 'di'i ming me skyes zhes bya bar gdags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis skye bo phal po che'i tshogs de dag gi bsam pa dang / bag
26a3('dul ba): la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ ci nas kyang sems can brgya phrag mang po de dag gis thos nas/ khyad par rnyed par 'gyur ba de lha bur chos bstan pa mdzad
26a4('dul ba): pas/ kha cig gis ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas/ kha cig gis ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu/ kha cig gis ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu/ kha cig gis ni rab tu
26a5('dul ba): byung ste/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas par gyur to// kha cig gis ni dro bar gyur pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / kha cig gis ni rtse mo dang / kha
26a6('dul ba): cig gis ni bzod pa chung ngu dang / 'bring bskyed par gyur to// kha cig gis ni nyan thos kyi byang chub dang / kha cig gis ni rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub dang / kha cig gis ni bla na med pa
26a7('dul ba): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sems bskyed par gyur to/ / kha cig gis ni skyabs su 'gro ba dang / bslab pa'i gzhi dag yang dag par blangs te/ 'khor de dag las phal cher sangs
26b1('dul ba): rgyas la gzhol ba dang / chos la 'bab pa dang / dge 'dun la bab par gyur to// de rgyal po gzugs can snying pos khye'u me skyes ma ma brgyad po/ pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / sgyu ma
26b2('dul ba): bsnun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang / dri ma 'phyi ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / rtsen grogs kyi ma ma gnyis la rjes su gtad do// de ma ma brgyad po dag gis 'o ma dang / zho dang / mar dang / zhun mar dang
26b3('dul ba): mar gyi snying khu dang / gzhan yang yo byad kyi bye brag gtso bo gtso bo dag gis sring bar byed/ skyed par byed cing / rdzing na gnas pa'i pad+ma bzhin du myur du skyed par byed do// de'i zhang po zong thogs
26b4('dul ba): te yul gzhan du song ba des/ ji ltar bdag gi sring mo la sems can zhugs par gyur pa de/ bcom ldan 'das kyis khye'ur skye bar 'gyur te/ rigs 'bar bar 'gyur zhing / lha dang mi'i
26b5('dul ba): dpal yang myong bar gyur nas/ nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ste/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa thos nas/ des
26b6('dul ba): zothong bsgyur te/ rin blangs nas/ rgyal po'i khab tu song ba dang / des 'di ltar bdag gi sring mo de 'chi ba'i dus la bab bo zhes thos so// thos nas kyang bsams pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
26b7('dul ba): de'i bu khye'u skye bar 'gyur te/ rigs 'bar bar 'gyur zhing / lha dang mi'i dpal yang myong bar gyur nas/ nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ste/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas/ dgra
27a1('dul ba): bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa de brdzun du ma gyur tam snyam nas/ des khyim tshes dag la dris pa
27a2('dul ba): bdag gi sring mo la sems can zhugs par gyur pa de/ bcom ldan 'das kyis khye'ur 'gyur te/ rigs 'bar bar 'gyur zhing / lha dang mi'i dpal yang myong bar gyur nas/ nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung
27a3('dul ba): ste/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan par thos so// thos nas bdag kun tu dga' ba las/ de yang 'chi ba'i dus la
27a4('dul ba): bab bo zhes thos nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa de brdzun du ma gyur tam/ de dag gis tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/ zla ba skar ma'i tshogs bcas sa la lhung yang srid// sa 'dir
27a5('dul ba): ri dang nags bcas mkha' la 'gro yang srid/ / rgya mtsho chen po'i chu ni skam par 'gyur srid kyi// drang srong chen po brdzun gsung 'gyur ba srid pa min// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
27a6('dul ba): brdzun du mi 'gyur te/ 'di ltar khyim thab des de ji lta ji ltar 'chi bar 'gyur ba de lha de ltar byas pas/ 'chi ba'i dus la bab nas/ de'i khye'u dbang thang chen po can mer bsregs kyang ma
27a7('dul ba): tshig pa mthu bo che zhig/ da ltar rgyal po'i pho brang na gso zhing 'dug go zhes smras pa dang / de khyim bdag shin tu bzang po'i gan du song ste smras pa/ khyim bdag khyod kyis mi rigs pa zhig
27b1('dul ba): byas so/ / ci zhig byas/ gcer bu pas bslus nas/ khyod kyis nga'i sring mo la sems can zhugs pa/ dzi b+ha ji ltar 'chi bar 'gyur ba de lha de ltar byas pas/ 'chi ba'i dus la bab par byas so// de'i
27b2('dul ba): khye'u dbang thang can mer bsregs kyang ma chog pa mthu bo che zhig/ da ltar rgyal po'i pho brang na gso zhing 'dug pa de la ni re zhig ci byar yang med de/ 'di ltar da yang gal te gzhon nu de blangs na de lta
27b3('dul ba): na legs/ 'on te mi len na ngas khyod gnyen du yang mi brtsi/ rabs yig kyang dor zhing / lam po che dang / srang dang / lam gyi sum mdo dang / bzhi mdo dag tu yang khyim bdag shin tu bzang
27b4('dul ba): bos bdag gi sring mo bsad de/ chung ma gsod pa 'di la sus kyang gtam 'dre bar mi bya'o zhes mi snyad pa bsgrag cing / rgyal po'i gnod pa yang byed du gzhug go zhes smras pa dang / des de thos nas
27b5('dul ba): skrag ste/ de skad smra ba dang sbyar na/ bdag la de ltar byed par nges so snyam nas/ de rgyal po'i gan du song ste rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal nas smras pa/ lha bdag gi nye du po'i mchid nas
27b6('dul ba): de yang gal te gzhon nu de blangs na de lta na legs/ 'on te mi len na ngas khyod gnyen du yang mi brtsi/ rabs yig kyang dor zhing / lam po che dang / srang dang / lam gyi sum mdo dang / bzhi mdo dag
27b7('dul ba): tu yang khyim bdag shin tu bzang pos bdag gi sring mo bsad de/ chung ma gsod pa 'di la sus kyang gtam 'dre bar mi bya'o// zhes mi snyan pa bsgrag cing / rgyal po'i gnod pa yang byed du gzhug
28a1('dul ba): go zhes mchi bas/ de'i slad du lhas gzhon nu me skyes bdag la stsal ba'i rigs so// rgyal pos smras pa/ khyim bdag gzhon nu me skyes ngas khyod las blangs pa ma yin gyi/
28a2('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis nga la gtad pa yin pas/ khyod la gal te gzhon nu dgos na/ gzhon nu'i ched du bcom ldan 'das la sngar zhus shig/ de bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song nas/ zhabs
28a3('dul ba): gnyis la phyag 'tshal te/ 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gi nye du po'i mchid nas/ da yang gal te gzhon nu de blangs na de lha na legs/ 'on to mi len na ngas khyod gnyen
28a4('dul ba): du yang mi brtsi/ rabs yig kyang dor zhing / lam po che dang / srang dang / lam gyi sum mdo dang / bzhi mdo dag tu yang khyim bdag shin tu bzang pos bdag gi sring mo bsad de/ chung ma
28a5('dul ba): gsod pa 'di la sus kyang gtam 'dre bar mi bya'o zhes mi snyan pa bsgrag cing / rgyal po'i gnod pa yang byed du gzhug go zhes mchi bas de'i slad du gzhon nu me skyes bdag la stsal ba'i rigs so// /
28a6('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis/ gal te khyim bdag shin tu bzang po gzhon nu me skyes ma thob na/ khrag tsha ba skyugs nas 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ba'i gnas skabs de lta bu yod par gzigs nas/
28a7('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo song la/ rgyal po gzugs can snying po la/ nga'i bkas a rog gya zhes byos la/ 'di skad ces rgyal po chen po khyim bdag
28b1('dul ba): shin tu bzang po la gzhon nu ma skyes byin cig/ gal te khyim bdag shin tu bzang po gzhon nu ma skyes ma thob na/ khrag tsha ba skyugs nas 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ba'i gnas skabs de lta
28b2('dul ba): bu yod par 'gyur ro zhes kyang sgo zhig/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos/ btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' mnyan nas/ rgyal po gzugs can snying po ga la ba der song
28b3('dul ba): steskye phyin nas/ rgyal po gzugs can snying po la 'di skad ces smras so// bcom ldan 'das kyis khyod la rgyal po chen po a rog gya zhes bka' stsal te/ rgyal po chen po khyim bdag shin tu bzang
28b4('dul ba): po la gzhon nu ma skyes byin cig/ gal te khyim bdag shin tu bzang po gzhon nu mi skyes ma thob na/ khrag tsha ba skyugs nas 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ba'i gnas skabs de lta bu yod par
28b5('dul ba): 'gyur ro zhes kyang bka' stsal to/ / rgyal pos smras pa/ btsun pa kun dga' bo/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad bka' stsal pa de bzhin 'tshal lo//
28b6('dul ba): tshatshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos rgyal po chen po a rog gya zhes smras te song ngo // rgyal pos smras pa/ khyim bdag gzhon nu 'di ngas bskyed de/ yid du 'ong zhing sdug pa yin pas/ dam tshig
28b7('dul ba): bcas la sbyin par bya ste/ nyi ma re re la yang dus gsum gsum du nga blta ba'i phyir gtong na sbyin par bya'o// des smras pa/ lha khyod kyi spyan sngar mi gtang na gzhan su'i thad du gtang bar
29a1('dul ba): bgyi/ gtang bar 'tshal lo// rgyal pos de rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan te/ glang po che la bskyon nas btang ngo // 'di ltar 'jig rten pa rnams kyi kun tu spyod pa ni/
29a2('dul ba): ji srid du pa gson pa de srid du bu'i ming mi sgrogs so// ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na khyim bdag shin tu bzang po 'chi ba'i dus byas nas/ gzhon nu me skyes pa'i khyim na gnas par gyur te/ de sangs rgyas
29a3('dul ba): la mngon par dang / chos dang dge 'dun la mngon par dad / sangs rgyas la skyabs su song / chos dang dge 'dun la skyabs su song ngo // des khyim bdag shin tu bzang pos phyogs gang du
29a4('dul ba): bdag gi ma bsad pa'i phyogs der gtsug lag khang brtsig tu bcug nas/ yo byad thams cad phun sum tshogs par sbyar te/ phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun la phul nas/ 'di ltar gnas brtan dag
29a5('dul ba): gis kyang mdo sde dag la/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na dku mnyed pa'i tshal na bzhugs so zhes nye bar sbyar ro// khyim bdag shin tu bzang po'i mi zho shas 'tsho ba yul gzhan du dong ba dag
29a6('dul ba): gis/ khyim bdag shin tu bzang po ni 'chi ba'i dus la bab bo// gzhon nu me skyes ni rang gi khyim na gnas te/ de sangs rgyas la mngon par dad / chos dang dge 'dun la mngon par dad/ sangs rgyas
29a7('dul ba): la skyabs su song / chos dang dge 'dun la skyabs su song ngo zhes thos so// thos nas kyang de dag gis tsan dan sa mchog pa'i lhung bzed gcig/ rin po che dag gis bkang ste khyim bdag me skyes la
29b1('dul ba): skyes su bskur ro/ / des kyang de shing ring po'i rtse mo la btags te bzhags nas/ 'di skad ces 'di sus kyang skas dang / ya gang dang / kyo btang dag gis blang bar mi bya'i/ 'di ltar dge sbyong ngam/
29b2('dul ba): bram ze gang dag rdzu 'phrul che ba 'am/ mthu che ba de dag las 'ga' zhig gis len na/ des ni 'di ci bder khyer la rag go zhes dril bsgrags pa yang byas so// gzhan mu stegs can rnams nang par sngar
29b3('dul ba): yangs nas/ chu ngogs dag tu nye reg byed du 'dong ba de dag gis de mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang khyim bdag me skyes la smras pa/ khyim bdag 'di ci yin/ des de dag la rgyas par bsnyad pa dang /
29b4('dul ba): de dag gis smras pa/ khyim bdag khyod shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong rnams la mngon par dad pas/ de dag nyid len par 'gyur ro zhes smras nas dong ngo // ji tsam na dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan dag rgyal
29b5('dul ba): po'i khab tu bsod snyoms la zhugs pa de dag gis de mthong nas/ de dag gis kyang / khyim bdag me skyes la smras pa/ khyim bdag 'di ci yin/ des de dag la de kho na bzhin du rgyas par bsnyad pa dang /
29b6('dul ba): de dag gis smras pa/ khyim bdag bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag gi yon tan ni bcab par bya/ skyon ni bsgrag par bya'o zhes bka' stsal na/ ji lhung bzed tsam gyi ched du bdag nyid bstan par bya/
29b7('dul ba): 'am zhes smras nas dong ngo // ji tsam na tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs stobs bcu pa de phyogs der 'ongs te/ khyim bdag la smras pa/ khyim bdag 'di ci yin/ des ji lta bu yin pa smras pa dang / tshe dang
30a1('dul ba): ldan pa 'od srungs stobs bcu pas bsams pa/ bdag gis thog ma med pa'i dus nas bsags pa'i nyon mongs pa'i tshogs rnams spangs shing bor la/ bsal zhing
30a2('dul ba): sbyang ba byas na/ khyim bdag gis bdag mu stegs can dang rdzu 'phrul bskrun par chad kyis/ de'i phyir 'di'i yid mgu bar bya'o snyam nas/ des lag pa glang po che'i sna lha bu brkyang skya/ lhung
30a3('dul ba): bzed de blangs nas/ des de khyer te gtsug lag khang du song ngo // de la dge slong gis smras pa/ gnas brtan khyod kyi tsan dan sa mchog pa'i lhung bzed 'di ga las mchis/ des ji ltar gyur
30a4('dul ba): pa brjod pa dang / dge slong dag gis smras pa/ gnas brtan khyod lhung bzed tsam gyi ched du khyim pa'i mdun du rdzu 'phrul rnam par bstan du rung ngam/ de tshe dang ldan pa dag rung yang bla/ mi rung yang
30a5('dul ba): bla ste/ byas zin pas da ci byar yang med do zhes zer skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol po dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong gis khyim pa'i mdun
30a6('dul ba): du rdzu 'phrul rnam par bstan par mi bya'o/ / rnam par ston na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// gzhan yang lhung bzed rnam pa bzhi po/ gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bai DUR+Ya
30a7('dul ba): las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa dang / gzhan yang lhung bzed rnam pa bzhi po/ ra gan dang / zangs dang / 'khar ba dang / shing las byas pa dag las/ 'di ltar lhung bzed
30b1('dul ba): snga ma bzhi po gang dag yin pa de dag ni/ ma blangs pa yang blang bar mi bya la/ blangs pa yang gtang bar bya'o// lhung bzed phyi ma bzhi po gang dag yin pa de dag ni/ ma blangs pa ni blang bar mi
30b2('dul ba): bya zhing / blangs pa na sman phor du longs spyod pas spyad par bya ba yin no// 'di ltar lcags dang / sa'i lhung bzed gnyis ni byin gyis brlab tu rung ba dag yin no// de nas dus gzhan zhig na khyim
30b3('dul ba): bdag me skyes lha dang mi'i dpal yang myong bar gyur nas/ rgyal po'i khab dang / tsam pa dag gi bar na sho gam gyi gnas shig yod pa de'i sho gam pa 'chi ba'i dus la bab nas/ de gnod sbyin gdug pa
30b4('dul ba): zhig tu skyes pa dang / des bu'i rmi lam du 'di skad ces/ bu khyod kyi gnas 'dir gnod sbyin gyi rten 'jugs su chug la/ der dril yang gyis la thogs shig dang / gang gi tshe der su dag zong las
30b5('dul ba): sho gam mi 'jal bar 'gro bar byed pa de'i tshe/ dris de sgra 'byin par byed cing / de dag phyir ldog pa las sho gam chod par 'gyur ro zhes bstan to// des gnyen bshes dang / nye du dang / rtsa lag
30b6('dul ba): ngag la rmi lam de bzlas nas/ nyi ma dang / tshes grangs dang / yud tsam dang / gza' dang / rgyu skar dang / dus shis pa las bab pa'i tshe gnas der gnod sbyin gyi chen 'dzugs su bcug nas/
30b7('dul ba): der dril yang byas te btags so// grong khyer tsam pa na bram ze zhig gis/ rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs pa dang / bram ze mo des bsams pa/ bdag bram zes thabs de dang de dag gis
31a1('dul ba): bsgrubs pa'i nor dag spyod cing / las ci yang mi byed par 'dug pa ni bdag gi tshul dang mthun pa ma yin no snyam nas/ de tshong dus su song ste/ ras bal nyos nas sel gyis
