87b3('dul ba): spangs te/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par 'gyur zhing / ji ltar bdag gi mkhan po/ bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyis/ bas mtha'i gnas mal la
87b4('dul ba): da pa rnams kyi nang na mchog tu bstan pa de bzhin du/ bdag kyang shAkya'i rgyal po chen po shAkya thub pa des pas mtha'i gnas mal la dad pa rnams kyi nang na mchog tu ston par gyur cig/ ces btab pa'i
87b5('dul ba): smon lam gyi dbang gis da ltar de bzhin gshegs pas/ bas mtha'i gnas mal la dad pa rnams kyi nang na mchog tu bstan to// dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin
87b6('dul ba): pa ni gcig tu gnag la/ gcig tu dkar ba rnams kyi ni gcig tu dkar/ 'dren ma rnams kyi ni 'dren ma yin no// dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa dang / 'dren ma rnams spangs nas/
87b7('dul ba): las gcig tu dkar ba dag la brtsal bar bya ste/ dge slong dag gis de lta bu la bslab par bya'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas
88a1('dul ba): sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ / drug sde rnams 'di byin cig/ 'di las byin cig ces 'dam zhing 'dam zhing zas za ba dang 'drim pa 'khrugs par gyur nas/ skabs de
88a2('dul ba): dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong gis 'dams shing zas bza' bar mi bya ste/ za na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro//
88a3('dul ba): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// dge slong rnams zas zab na lhung bzed bzed pa las/ de lhung bzed
88a4('dul ba): kyi gzhi'i steng du lhung lhung bzed kyi gzhi bzed pa las lhung bzed du lhung nas/ de rnams 'gyod de mi za ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
88a5('dul ba): kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag lhung bzed bzed pa las/ lhung bzed kyi gzhi'i steng du lhung na byin len byas pa zhes bya/ lhung bzed kyi gzhi bzod pa las lhung bzed kyi nang du lhung na byin len byas pa
88a6('dul ba): zhes bya/ lhung bzed bzed pa las lhung bzed kyi nang du lhung na byin len byas pa zhes bya/ lhung bzed kyi gzhi bzed pa las lhung bzed kyi gzhi'i nang du lhung na byin len byas pa zhes bya ste/ 'on kyang byin len gyi
88a7('dul ba): sems ni nye bar gzhag par bya'o/ / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yid na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' bo
88b1('dul ba): 'khar ba'i mgar ba'i drung du song nas/ des smras pa/ bzhin bzangs 'khar ba'i lhung bzed cig byan nus sam/ des smras pa/ 'phags pa 'di nyid bdag gi bzo lags kyis/ tshad ji tsam zhig 'gyi
88b2('dul ba): chen por bya'o/ / 'phags pa khyod la 'khar ba'i lhung bzed chen po ci 'tshal/ bkren pa khyod ci rin med par byed du 'jug snyam nas/ rin thang bzhin sbyin gyis byos shig/ des bsams pa/ 'di la bdag
88b3('dul ba): gi 'khar ba ci zhig 'god bya'o snyam nas/ des de'i 'khar ba'i lhung bzed chen po zhig byas so// des smras pa/ gang 'di'i nang du chud pa gzhan zhig kyang gyis shig/ des gzhan yang byas so// de bzhin
88b4('dul ba): du gzhan gang yin pa bdun pa'i bar du byas nas/ de rnams tshe dang ldan pa he dga' bos/ dge tshul 'khrur bcug ste/ tshon sna lnga pa'i skud pa las dra ba byed du bcug nas/ de rnams der bcug ste/ go
88b5('dul ba): rims pashams nas dge tshul gyi mgo la bkur te/ gang du mgron du bos pa der 'gro'o// son nas de dag bkram ste 'dug pa dang / khyim bdag dang bram ze rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa ci khyod
88b6('dul ba): kyis 'khar ba'i mgar ba'i zong ba kram mam/ des smras pa/ bkren pa khyed ci shes/ 'dir ni re zhig phye dag blang ngo // 'dir ni snum khung dag go/ 'dir ni 'bros chan dag go/ gzhan rnams
88b7('dul ba): su ni tshong ma dag blang ngo / / de rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa gal te de ltar na go/ res 'ga' tshong ma mang po dag 'byung bas/ gzhan dang gzhan dag kyang nye bar gzhag dgos so zhes byas pa dang /
89a1('dul ba): de cang mi smra bar 'dug go// skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ nyes dmigs gang cung zad
89a2('dul ba): byung ba ni/ dge slong rnams 'khar ba'i lhung bzed 'chang ba las gyur gyis/ de lta bas na dge slong gis 'khar ba'i lhung bzed bcang bar mi bya'o// 'chang na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// kha gzar
89a3('dul ba): dang / tshwa khug dang / phul ba'i btung phor ni ma gtogs so// // sdom ni/ rkang pa bkru ba bkag pa dang // chol zangs dag ni gnang ba dang // de bzhin ba sil yab nyid dang ni// sbrang
89a4('dul ba): ma rnams la g.yab pa'o/ / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// dge slong rnams bab bab tu rkang pa
89a5('dul ba): 'khru ba der sbrang bu dag gis gang bar 'dug go/ ji tsam na bram ze dang khyim bdag gtsug lag khang lhar 'ongs pa de dag gis mthong nas smras pa/ 'phags pa sbrang bu zi zi mchi bas gang ba'i phyogs 'di/
89a6('dul ba): ci zhig/ dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/ bdag cag gis 'dir rkang pa bkrus so// de dag 'phya ste/ shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong rnams ni gtsang zla med de/ bab bab tu rkang pa 'khru'o zhes pa'i skabs de
89a7('dul ba): dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rkang pa bab bab tu bkru bar mi bya'i/ 'on kyang gnas khang gi steng shar lho'i mtshams
89b1('dul ba): su rkang pa bkru ba'i gnas bya'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis rkang pa bkru ba'i gnas bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong rnams kyis ji lta bu bya ba mi shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
89b2('dul ba): pab/ rus sbal lha bur bya'o// rab tu 'jam par byed pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rtsub por bya'o// dge slong rgas pa/ 'khogs pa/ nyam chung ba de dag phyogs der 'gro mi nus pa
89b3('dul ba): dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de dag gis gyo mo nye bar gzhag par bya'o// dge slong rnams gyo mor 'khru ba na de chag nas/ je ma rung bar gyur pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
89b4('dul ba): chos zangs nye bar gzhag par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis chol zangs nye bar gzhag par bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang / drug sde rnams kyis gser dang / dngul dang / bai nuR+Ya dang / shel las byas
89b5('dul ba): pa'i cho la zangs dag nye bar gzhag go/ / bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis mthong nas/ 'phags pa 'di ci zhig/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ bzhin bzangs dag bcom ldan 'das kyis chol zangs gnang
89b6('dul ba): ngongo/ / 'phags pa ci dge sbyong khyed 'dod pa'i yon tan dag gis gnod dam/ de dag gis smras pa/ khyed kyi mgrin par rdog pas gnan to// de dag 'phya ba'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom
89b7('dul ba): ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gser dang / dngus dang / shel dang / bai nuR+Ya las byas pa'i chol zangs dag nye bar gzhag par mi bya ste/ 'on kyang 'dzi
90a1('dul ba): ba las byas pa'i chol zangs nye bar gzhag par bya'o/ / rnga mo lta bu nye bar gzhag pa dang / de ldeg nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sprul pa/ glang po che'i rkang pa lta bur bya
90a2('dul ba): ning de'i dbus su 'bur ka dam pa'i me tog lha bur bya'o/ / shin tu 'jam por byas pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rtsub por bya'o// dge slong rnams chol zangs bab bab tu 'jog
90a3('dul ba): nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge 'dun gyi khang thog tu khas phu ba la zhog cig/ gang zag dag gi ni gnas khang gi sgo lkog tu zhog cig/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yul
90a4('dul ba): ko'u sham bi na sgra len gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ / dpyid kyi yul la bab nas/ dge slong rnams tshabs rmya ste/ de dag lus skya bo bseng pa seng por gyur cing / kenyam chung / shig shig
90a5('dul ba): po/ rong nyams par gyur pa khyim bdag dang bram ze rnams kyis mthong nas smras pa/ 'phags pa khyed ci'i slad du lus skya bo bseng ba seng por gyur cing / rke/ nyam chung / shig shig po/ rnyod nyams
90a6('dul ba): par gyur/ de dag gis ji ltar gyur pa bsnyad pa dang / de rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag khyed bsil yab mi 'chang ngam/ bzhin bzangs dag bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo // 'phags/
90a7('dul ba): pa dag khyed kyi ston pa ni thugs rje can yin pas gnang bar 'gyur ro// skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na gnang
90b1('dul ba): gis/ bsil yab bcang bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bsil yab bcang bar bya'o nas bka' stsal pa dang / drug sde rnams kyis yu ba gser dang / dngul dang / shes dang / be'uH
90b2('dul ba): las byas pa/ bsrubs pa/ bkra ba dang / nye bar bkra ba'i yu ba can gyi bsil yab dag bcangs pa dang / bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis zhes bya ba nas/ khyed kyi mgrin pa rdog pas
90b3('dul ba): gnan to/ / zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no// de dag 'phya ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ yu ba gser dang /
90b4('dul ba): dngul dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / shel las byas pa/ bsrubs pa/ bkra ba dang / nye bar bkra ba'i yu ba can gyi bsil yab dag nye bar gzhag par mi bya'i/ 'on kyang bsil yab gnyis
90b5('dul ba): bo rtsa bal ba dza las byas pa dang / shing ta la'i 'dab ma bcang bar bya'o// bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can dag dge slong rnams la bsim ya rnam pa sna tshogs 'bul ba na zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma
90b6('dul ba): bzhin no/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na gnang gis/ dge 'dun gyi phyir bcang bar bya'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yangs pa can na spre'u rdzing
90b7('dul ba): gi 'gram khang pa brtsegs pa na bzhugs so/ / dge slong rnams la sbrang ma dag za ste/ de dag gi lus sbrang mas zos pas/ 'brum bus gang ste/ de dag gis yang dang yang du thugs pa dang /
91a1('dul ba): bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag khyed ci'i phyir lus 'di ltar 'brum bus gang / de dag gis ji ltar gyur pa bsnyad pa dang / de rnams kyis smras pa/
91a2('dul ba): 'phags pa dag khyed sbrang yab mi 'chang ngam/ bzhin bzangs dag bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo // 'phags pa dag khyed kyi ston pa ni thugs rje can yin pas gnang bar 'gyur ro// skabs de dge slong
91a3('dul ba): rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na gnang gis/ sbrang yab bcang bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis sbrang yab bcang bar bya'o zhes
91a4('dul ba): bka' stsal pa dang / drug sde rnams kyis yu ba gser dang / dngul dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / shel las byas pa dang / rnga ma las byas pa'i bsil yab dag nye bar gzhag pa dang / bram ze dang khyim bdag
91a5('dul ba): rnams zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no/ / spang yab ni lnga ste/ bal las byas pa dang / sha na las byas pa dang / ras bal las byas pa dang / ras ma dang / lo ma sbams pa'o//
91a6('dul ba): sdom ni/ gos mdud pa dang lus dang ni// 'khar ba dra ba 'chang ba dang // sgog rgya dag ni bkag pa dang // nad pa la ni gnang ba'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal
91a7('dul ba): byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis stongs mo bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang / de na dge slong zhig skas la 'dzeg pa na/ 'og na shing mkhan
91b1('dul ba): zhig 'dug pa des/ de mdoms thang ba mthong nas smras pa/ 'phags pa khyod skyes pa'i dbang po dang ldan pas bdag gis po lags par gdod 'tshal lo// de gnod nas cang mi smra bar 'dug pa'i
91b2('dul ba): skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ nyes dmigs gang cung zad byung ba ni/ dge slong rnams gos mdud pa ma bor ba nyid
91b3('dul ba): du skas la 'dzeg pa las gyur gyis/ de'i phyir dge slong mkhar lan byed pa gos mdud pa bor nas/ mkhar lan byed du gzhug go snyam du dgongs nas/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong
91b4('dul ba): dag de lta bas na dge slong stongs mo byed pas gos mdud pa bor nas/ mkhar lan bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis gos mdud pa bor nas/ mkhar lan bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /
91b5('dul ba): dge slong rnams gos mdud pa bor nas/ mkhar lan byed pa na/ ma dad pa rnams 'phya ste/ 'phags pa ci stobs 'gyed dam/ de dag gis smras pa/ bzhin bzangs dag mkhar ldan byed do//
91b6('dul ba): de dag cang mi smra bar 'dug pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang dag skas la 'jog pa de dag gis
91b7('dul ba): mdud pa dor bar bya'i/ gzhan dag gis ni ma yin no// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so//
92a1('dul ba): drug sde rnams lus kyis khur khyer ba dang / bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams 'phya ste/ 'phags pa bdag cag ni re zhig pha ma dang / bu dang / chung ma'i slad du khur thogs
92a2('dul ba): na/ khyed su'i slad du lus kyis khur bsdams/ de dag gis smras pa/ bzhin bzangs dag bdag cag la yang ston pa mchod pa dang / dge 'dun pa shos gsol pa dang / nad pa rnams kyi rim
92a3('dul ba): dang / bya ba mang po yod do// de dag cang mi smra bar 'dug go/ skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
92a4('dul ba): stsal pa/ de lta bas na dge slong gis lus kyis khur bkur bar mi bya'o// khyer na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la
92a5('dul ba): bzhugs so/ / dge slong rnams bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la 'dzeg cing 'bab pa na/ de dag 'gred cing brdeg 'chos te snad par gyur to// skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa
92a6('dul ba): dang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na dge slong rnams kyis 'khar ba bcang par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams kyis 'khar ba bcang bar bya'o zhes bka'
92a7('dul ba): stsal ba dang / drug sde rnams kyis gser dang / dngus dang / bai DUr+ya dang / shel las byas pa'i 'khar ba/ bsrubs pa/ bkra ba/ nye bar bkra ba dag bcangs pa bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams
92b1('dul ba): kyis mthong nas/ 'phya ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de lta bas na gnyis kyis 'khar ba
92b2('dul ba): bcang bar bya ste/ rgan po rgas te nyam chung ba dang / nad pa sbyor mi nus pas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis gnyis kyis 'khar ba bcang bar bya ste/ rgan po rgas te nyam chung ba dang / nad pa sbyor
92b3('dul ba): mi bzod pas so zhes bka' stsal pa dang / rgan por gtogs pa dang / nad par gtogs pa rnams kyang 'khar ba 'chang ba la zhugs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgan po
92b4('dul ba): dang nad pas/ dge 'dun la 'khar ba'i sdom pa gsol bar bya zhing / gang la dge 'dun gyis 'khar ba'i sdom pa byin pa des 'khar ba bcang bar bya'o// gsol ba ni 'di ltar bya ste/ gnas
92b5('dul ba): mal bshams la/ gaN+DI brdungs te/ dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la bsgo nas/ dge 'dun thams cad 'dus shing 'khod pa dang / dge slong rgan po rgas te nyam chung ba 'am
92b6('dul ba): nad pa sbyor mi bzod pas/ rgan pa'i mthar tsog tsog pur 'dug la thal mo sbyar te/ 'di skad ces smra bar bya'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ bdag dge
92b7('dul ba): slong rgan po rgas te nyam chung ba 'am/ nad pa sbyor mi bzod pa ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge 'dun las 'khar ba'i sdom pa gsol na/ dge 'dun thugs brtse ba can btsun pa rnams kyis thugs
93a1('dul ba): brtse bas nye bar bzung ste/ bdag dge slong rgan po rgas te nyam chung ba 'am/ nad pa sbyor mi bzod pa ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la 'khar ba'i sdom pa stsal du gsol/
93a2('dul ba): de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum gyi bar du'o// de'i 'og tu dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas nas las bya ste/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong rgan po rgas te nyam
93a3('dul ba): chung ba 'am/ nad pa sbyor mi bzod pa ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di/ dge 'dun las 'khar ba'i sdom pa gsol te/ gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la babacing bzod na/ dge 'dun gyis gnang bar
93a4('dul ba): mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis dge slong rgas te nyam chung ba 'am/ nad pa sbyor mi bzod pa ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la/ 'khar ba'i sdom pa stsal to// 'di ni gsol pa'o// las ni 'di
93a5('dul ba): ltar bya ste/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong rgan po rgas te nyam chung ba 'am/ nad pa sbyor mi bzod pa ming 'dizhes bgyi ba/
93a6('dul ba): dge 'dun las 'khar ba'i sdom pa gsol te/ de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis dge slong rgan po rgas te nyam chung ba 'am/ nad pa sbyor mi bzod pa ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la 'khar ba'i sdom
93a7('dul ba): pab stsol na/ tshe dang ldan pa gang dag/ dge slong rgan po rgas te nyam chung ba 'am/ nad pa sbyor mi bzod pa ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la/ 'khar ba'i sdom pa stsal bar bzod pa de dag ni cang
93b1('dul ba): ma gsung zhig/ gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig/ dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas/ dge 'dun gyis dge slong rgan po rgas te nyam chung ba 'am/ nad pa sbyor mi bzod pa ming 'di
93b2('dul ba): zhes bgyi ba la/ 'khar ba'i sdom pa su la lags te/ 'di ltar cang mi gsungs pas de de bzhin du 'dzin to// gang la dge 'dun gyis 'khar ba'i sdom pa byin pa des 'khar ba bcang
93b3('dul ba): pabar bya ste/ 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o// / bam po drug pa// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la bzhugs so//
93b4('dul ba): dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams dang / rlung nad can rnams bya rgod phung po'i ri la 'dzeg pa dang 'bab pa na/ 'gred cing brdeg 'chos nas snang par yang gyur/ bya ma bum dang ril ba spyi
93b5('dul ba): blugs dag kyang chag go/ / skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na dge slong rnams kyis dra ba bcang bar
93b6('dul ba): bya'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams kyis dra ba bcang bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang / drug sde rnams kyis tshon sna lnga pa'i skud pa las byas pa'i dra ba bcangs pa dang / bram ze
93b7('dul ba): dang khyim bdag rnams kyis mthong nas 'phya bar byed do/ / skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ tshon sna lnga pa'i
94a1('dul ba): skud pa las byas pa'i dra ba bcang bar mi bya'i/ 'on kyang tshon sna gcig pa las byas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis tshon sna gcig las byas pa'i dra ba bcang bar bya'o zhes bka'
94a2('dul ba): sul pa dang / rgas pas tam chung bar gtogs pa rnams dang / rlung nad can du gtogs pa rnams kyang dra ba 'chang ba la zhugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgan po dang rlung
94a3('dul ba): nad can gyis kyang / dge 'dun las dra ba'i sdom pa gsol bar bya zhing / gang la dge 'dun gyis dra ba'i sdom pa byin pa des dra ba bcang bar bya'o// gsol ba ni 'di ltar bya ste/ gnas mal ba shams
94a4('dul ba): la ga N+DI brdungs te/ dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la bsgo nas/ dge 'dun thams cad 'dus te 'dug pa dang / dge slong rgan po rgas te nyam chung ba 'am/ rlung nad can gyis rgan pa'i
94a5('dul ba): mthar tsog tsog pur 'dug ste thal mo sbyar nas/ tshig 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ bdag dge slong rgan po rgas te nyam chung ba
94a6('dul ba): 'am/ rlung nad can ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge 'dun las dra ba'i sdom pa gsol na/ dge 'dun btsun pa thugs brtse ba can rnams kyis thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste/ bdag dge slong rgan po rgas
94a7('dul ba): te nyam chung ba 'am/ rlung nad can ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la dra ba'i sdom pa stsal du gsol/ de bzhin du lan gsum gyi bar du'o// de'i 'og tu dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas nas/ las bya ste/
94b1('dul ba): dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong rgan po rgas te nyam chung ba 'am/ rlung nad can ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di/ dge 'dun las dra ba'i sdom pa gsol na/ gal te dge 'dun
94b2('dul ba): gyi dus la bab cing bzod na/ dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis dge slong rgan po rgas te nyam chung ba 'am/ rlung nad can ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la dra ba'i sdom pa
94b3('dul ba): gsol to/ / 'di ni gsol ba'o// las ni 'di ltar bya ste/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong rgan po rgas te nyam chung ba 'am/ rlung nad can ming 'di zhes bgyi ba/ dge
94b4('dul ba): 'dun las dra ba'i sdom pa gsol to/ / de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis dge slong rgan po rgas te nyam chung ba 'am/ rlung nad can ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la dra ba'i sdom pa stso la nA/ tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge
94b5('dul ba): slong rgan po rgas te ham chung ba 'am/ rlung nad can ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la dra ba'i sdom pa stsal bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung zhig/ gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig/ dge 'dun gyis
94b6('dul ba): bzod cing gnang nas/ dge 'dun gyis dge slong rgan po rgas te nyam chung ba 'am/ rlung nad can ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la dra ba'i sdom pa stsal lags te/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du
94b7('dul ba): 'dzin to/ / gang la dge 'dun gyis dra ba'i sdom pa byin par gyur pa des dra ba bcang bar bya ste/ 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o// dge slong gzhan dag cig la 'khar ba yang dgos/ drab
95a1('dul ba): yang dgos nas/ de dag la dge slong rnams kyis 'khar ba dang dra ba ba'i sdom pa so sor byin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsas pa/ 'khar ba dang dra ba'i sdom pa
95a2('dul ba): cig caru snga ma bzhin sbyin par bya'o/ / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// mnyan yod na dge
95a3('dul ba): slong zhig 'dug pa des sgog sgyu zos nas/ de bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo ngos phyag 'tshal nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// bcom
95a4('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong de la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong / dge slong khyod la chos bstan gyis rna gtod la 'dug cig/ des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas
95a5('dul ba): phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis de la chos bstan par brtsams te/ ji lta ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis de la chos bstan pa de lha de ltar dge slong de/ bcom ldan 'das la dris
95a6('dul ba): gnod par gyur na mi rung ngo snyam nas kha logs shig tu lha'o/ / lan gnyis lan gsum du bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong de la 'di skad ces/ dge slong / dge slong khyod la chos bstan gyis
95a7('dul ba): rna gtong cig ces bka' stsal na/ dge slong de lan gnyis lan gsum du yang kha gzhan du bltas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
95b1('dul ba): spyan snga nas song ngo / / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa yin pas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la rmas pa/ kun dga'
95b2('dul ba): bo ci'i phyir ngas ji lta ji ltar chos bstan pa de lta de ltar dge slong de kha gzhan du lha/ des gsol pa/ btsun pa dge slong des sgog skya 'tshal to// kun dga' bo dge slong dag gang gis na bden pa
95b3('dul ba): rnams kyi bar chad du 'gyur ba sgog skya za ba lta/ bcom ldan 'das 'tshal lags so// kun dga' bo gal te dge slong 'dis de ring sgog skya zos par ma gyur na/ deng nyid du 'dis 'jig tshogs
95b4('dul ba): la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas par 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo de lta bas na dge slong gis da phyin chad sgog sgyu dang /
95b5('dul ba): sku 'dod dang / ki'u yongs su longs spyod par mi bya ste/ yongs su longs spyod na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// yang de'i tshe/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te/
95b6('dul ba): 'dug pa des bsams pa/ dge slong 'dis de ring bden pa dag ma mthong na re zhig sang mthong bar 'gyur ram blta'o snyam nas/ sems pa la zhugs pa dang ma mthong ngo // des rab kyi mtha'
95b7('dul ba): pa'i bsam gtan bzhi pa la rnam par bltas nas/ dus ji tsam na mthong bar 'gyur ba sems pa la zhugs na 'on kyang ma mthong ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas
96a1('dul ba): tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ dal ba'i mchog 'di 'dis bor nas// 'di yis 'di na bden pa dag/ nam yang shin tu mthong bar ni// mi 'gyur ba yi gnas de yod//
96a2('dul ba): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i sems mkhyen nas/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu khyod sangs rgyas kyi yul la lag 'jug par ma byed
96a3('dul ba): cig/ 'di ni 'di nas nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi yul las 'das pa'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan
96a4('dul ba): pa/ bde bar gangashegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad zil gyis gnon pa
96a5('dul ba): zhes bya ba'i ston pa 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de'i bstan pa la 'di rab tu byung nas/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ro// de skad ces gsungs nas/
96a6('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ nyes dmigs gang cung zad byung ba ni/ dge slong dag sgog sgyu za ba las gyur gyis/ de lta bas na dge slong gis sgog rgyu bza' bar mi bya'o// za na 'gal
96a7('dul ba): tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis sgog gya bza' bar mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong zhig na de sman pa'i drung du song ste nad med cig ces byas nas smras pa/
96b1('dul ba): bzhin bzangs kho bo la nad 'di lta bu zhig byung na/ sman ston cig/ sman pas smras pa/ 'phags pa sgog skya gsol cig dang khyod sos par 'gyur ro// des smras pa/ bzhin bzangs bcom
96b2('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo / / 'phags pa khyod kyi sman 'di yin te/ gzhan gyis ni sos par mi nus so// skabs de dge slong rnams la smras so// dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das
96b3('dul ba): la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gal te sman pa dge slong khyod kyi sman 'di yin te/ gzhan gyis ni sos par mi nus so zhes zer na bza' bar bya ste/ 'di la 'gyod
96b4('dul ba): par mi bya'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong nad pas sman pa'i lung gis sgog skya bza' 'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong nad pas sgog skya zos nas/ gtsug lag khang la yang longs
96b5('dul ba): spyod par byed/ gnas mal dang / snum phyi sa dang / chab khung du yang 'jug/ dge 'dun gyi nang du yang 'gro/ bram ze dang khyim bdag 'ongs shing lhags pa rnams la yang chos ston/
96b6('dul ba): mchod rten la yang phyag byed/ bram ze dang khyim bdag gi khyim dag tu yang nye bar 'gro// skyed mos tshal dang / 'dun sa dang / lha khang dang / skye bos gang ba'i phyogs gzhan dag tu yang
96b7('dul ba): 'dug pa dang / bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis dri tshor nas/ 'phya smod kha zer zhing / dge sbyong shAkya'i bu'i rnams kyi dge sbyong gi tshul nyams/ tshangs pa'i tshul nyams te/
97a1('dul ba): ni rab tu byung ba rnams sgrog skya ba'o zhes pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsob pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
97a2('dul ba): ngas dge slong sgog skya za ba'i kun tu spyad pa'i chos bca' bar bya ste/ dge slong sgog skya za bas sgog sgyu za bzhin du gtsug lag khang la yongs su longs spyod par mi bya/ gnas mal la ma yin/
97a3('dul ba): snum phyi sar 'jug par mi bya/ chab khung sar ma yin/ dge 'dun gyi nang du 'gro bar mi bya/ bram ze dang khyim bdag 'ongs shing lhags pa rnams la chos bstan par mi bya/ mchod rten la phyag mi
97a4('dul ba): bya/ bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyi khyim du nye bar 'gro bar mi bya/ skyed mol tshal dang / 'dun sa dang / lha khang dang / skye bos gang ba gzhan dag tu gnas par mi bya'i/ phyogs dben pa gang du
97a5('dul ba): gzhan dag gis mthong na/ ma dad pa skye bar mi 'gyur bar bza' bar bya'o// gang gi tshe bya ba zin par gyur pa de'i tshe phyogs de nyid du zhag bdun 'dug par bya'o// sku 'dod na ni zhag gsum/ ki'u na ni
97a6('dul ba): zhag gcig go/ de nas khrus byas la/ chos gos dag kyang bkru bar bya zhing / 'dug pa dag gis bdug par bya'o// de nas dri nga ba med pa dang / gtsug lag khang du 'jug par bya zhing / ji ltar
97a7('dul ba): bgag pa yang bya'o/ / sgog skya za ba'i dge slong gis kun tu spyad pa'i chos ji ltar bcas pa rnams yang dag par blangs te mi gnas na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// phran tshegs las sgo dang po
97b1('dul ba): rdzogs so/ / // bsdus pa'i sdom ni/ chan pas 'dreg dang gdugs dang ni// be'u ras dang ni rgyan spel ma// len dang sogs dang khrus dang ni// gcin dang sgo 'bar
97b2('dul ba): sdom ni/ chan pas 'dreg dang mngoms dang ni// de bzhin byin pa nyid dang ni// khri dang rtswa stan gcig dang ni// khyim na gnas dang bgo ba min// sangs
97b3('dul ba): rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ / gang gi tshe khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun
97b4('dul ba): la/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal phul ba de'i tshe/ des 'phags pa rnams kyi sgra dang kha spu brags shig ces 'dreg mkhan gyi mi btang ba dang zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no// nye dga' bos
97b5('dul ba): smras pa/ bzhin bzangs khyod skra chan pas 'dreg shes sam/ des smras pa/ 'phags pa de nyid bdag gi bzo lags so// bzhin bzangs gal te de lha na tshur shog bregs shig/
97b6('dul ba): des sgra chan pas bregs pa dang / nye dga' bos smras pa/ da dung bregs shig/ des yang bregs pa dang / des smras pa/ da dung yang bregs shig/ des yang bregs so// de bzhin du
97b7('dul ba): ji tsam nyi ma nub kyi bar du ma btang nas/ de'i 'og tu 'di skad ces smras te/ bkren pa khyod ci yang mi shes pa zhig 'di kho na bzhin mnyam par byos te song zhig ces bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin
98a1('dul ba): no/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong gis sgra chan pas breg par mi bya'o// dge slong skra chan pas 'dreg na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// bcom ldan
98a2('dul ba): 'das kyis dge slong gis sgra chan pas breg par mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong dag gi mgo la rma byung nas spu gris reg pa na/ de dag snad pa'i skabs de/ dge slong dag gis/ bcom
98a3('dul ba): ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rma'i than kor gyi sgra chan pas breg par bya zhing / lhag ma rnams spu gris breg par bya'o// sangs rgyas bcom
98a4('dul ba): ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ / de nas yang khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis 'dreg mkhan gyi mi btang ste zhes bya ba'i bar
98a5('dul ba): snga ma bzhin no/ / bzhin bzangs mdoms kyi phyogs kyi spu 'dreg shes sam/ des smras pa/ 'phags pa de nyid bdag gi bzo lags so// bzhin bzangs gal te de lha na tshur shog bregs shigi
98a6('dul ba): 'phags pa ji 'dra bar breg/ bzhin bzangs mdzes par bregs shig/ des breg par brtsams pa dang / nye dgas smras pa/ bzhin bzangs 'di ltar byos shig/ des de bzhin byas pa dang
98a7('dul ba): yang smras pa/ gzhan 'di lta bur yang byos shig ces des de ji tsam nyi ma nub kyi bar du ma btang nas/ dge sbyong shAkya'i sras rnams kyi dge sbyong gi tshul ni nyams/ tshangs pa'i tshul ni nyams te/
98b1('dul ba): da ni gsang ba'i phyogs kyi spu yang 'dreg par byed do// zhes smod par byed/ gzhog 'phyas byed/ kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de/ dge slong dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan
98b2('dul ba): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na dge slong gis mdoms kyi phyogs kyi spu breg par mi bya'o// dge slong mdoms kyi phyogs kyi spu 'dreg par byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro//
98b3('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis mdoms kyi phyogs kyi spu breg par mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong dag gi mdoms kyi phyogs su rma byung ba dang / dge slong dag 'gyod nas spu 'dreg
98b4('dul ba): par mi byed do/ / dge slong gzhan dag la yang srin bu byung ste/ de dag de'i gnod pas dge ba'i phyogs kyi bya ba mi nus pa'i skabs de/ dge slong dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /
98b5('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan dag la bstan nas/ rma'am srin bu'i phyir ni mdoms kyi phyogs kyi spu breg par bya ste/ 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o//
98b6('dul ba): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ba na bzhugs so// de nas yang khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis
98b7('dul ba): 'dreg mkhan gyi mi btang ba dang zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no/ / bzhin bzangs khyod byin spu 'dreg shes sam/ 'phags pa de nyid bdag gi bzo lags so// bzhin bzangs gal
99a1('dul ba): de lta na tshur shog bregs shig/ 'phags pa ci 'dra bar breg par bgyi/ bzhin bzangs mdzes par bregs shig/ des breg par brtsams pa dang / nye dga' bos
99a2('dul ba): smras pa/ bzhin bzangs 'di ltar byos shig/ des de bzhin byas pa dang / yang smras pa/ gzhan 'di ltar yang byos shig/ des de ji tsam nam sros kyi bar du ma btang bas/ khyim bdag
99a3('dul ba): mgon med zas sbyin gyis de la zhes bya ba nas/ dris pa zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no// des ji ltar gyur pa smras pa dang / de smod par byed pa'i skabs de/ dge slong dag gis/ bcom ldan
99a4('dul ba): 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na dge slong gis byin spu breg par mi bya'o// dge slong byin spu 'dreg par byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro//
99a5('dul ba): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yangs pa can na spre'u rdzing gi 'gram khang pa brtsegs pa na bzhugs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis byin spu breg par mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /
99a6('dul ba): dge slong rnams kyi brla la rma byung zhing / dge slong gzhan dag la srin bu byung nas/ de dag de'i gnod pas dge ba'i phyogs bya bar mi nus par gyur pa'i skabs de/ dge slong dag gis/ bcom ldan
99a7('dul ba): 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rma byung ba'i phyir ram/ srin bu'i phyir ni byin spu breg par bya ste/ 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o// sangs rgyas bcom
99b1('dul ba): ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ / drug sde rnams khri gcig la nyal bar byed cing / de dag der nyal nas ku re byed/ rtse bar byed//
99b2('dul ba): caco smra bar byed/ rgod pa dang / 'phyar g.yeng dang / lus la rdeg par byed pa'i skabs de/ dge slong dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa
99b3('dul ba): nyes dmigs gang cung zad byung ba ni/ dge slong rnams khri gcig la nyal bar byed pa las gyur pas/ de'i phyir dge slong gzhan dang lhan cig khri gcig la nyal du mi gzhug go snyam du dgongs nas/
99b4('dul ba): dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag khyed kyis deng phyin chad/ dge slong gis khri gcig la nyal bar mi bya'o// byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge
99b5('dul ba): slong gis khri gcig la nyal bar mi bya'o zhes bka' sprul pa dang / ji tsam na dge slong mang po rnams ljongs rgyu zhing dong ste/ ljongs rgyu ba na ri brags shig tu phyin nas/ de dag gis der khri brnyas
99b6('dul ba): pa dang / de dag gis khri dag byin no// de rnams kyis smras pa/ 'di dag nyungs kyis/ gzhan yang snoms te smyon cig/ de dag gis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag bdag cag ni khri re re la
99b7('dul ba): skye bo mang po dag nyal bar bgyi na/ khyed gzhan yang g.yor ram/ re re la gnyis sam gsum gzims par mdzod cig/ de rnams kyis spras pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis khri gcig la
100a1('dul ba): gnyis sam gsum nyal du ma gnang na/ ji ltar nyal bar bya/ de dag gis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag khri gzhan ni ma mchis so// de skad smras pas cang mi smra bar 'khod
100a2('dul ba): ba'i skabs de/ dge slong dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong gang dag ngo tsha shes shing 'gyod pa dang ldan la bslab pa 'dod pa de
100a3('dul ba): dag gis dran pa nye bar gzhag ste/ gding ba bting la bar du chos gos kyi gtur bu 'am/ lhung bzed kyi snod dag bcug la nyal bar bya ste/ 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o// khri la ji lta bar/
100a4('dul ba): rurtswa stan dang gzhan dag la yang de dang 'dra'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// dge
100a5('dul ba): slong mang po rnams ljongs rgyu zhing dong ba dang / ri brags shig tu phyin nas/ de rnams kyis khyim bdag cig las bsti gnas brnyas so// grang ba'i dus la bab pas de rnams kyis gos bsnyas
100a6('dul ba): pa dang / bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis 'di dag ni rab 'byung ba yin no snyam ste/ snying rje nye bar bzhag ste gos dag byin pa dang / gang gis gang thob pa des de gyon te nyal nas/ dge slong
100a7('dul ba): gzhan dag grang bas sgrubs par gyur pa'i skabs de/ dge slong dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang gis gang thob pa de dag nyid kyis
100b1('dul ba): bgo bar mi bya'i/ thams cad kyis bgo bar bya ste/ gcig rnyed par gyur pa gang yin pa des thams cad kyi steng du rgan rims bzhin ji tsam yog pa dgab par bya'o// ji tsam na yang ri brags
100b2('dul ba): gzhan zhig tu song ba dang / gos gcig cig rnyed nas/ de dag gi steng du g.yogs pa na/ nye dgas de gyon te 'chag tu song ba dang / dge slong rnams grang bas sdug bsngal bar gyur nas smras pa/
100b3('dul ba): btsun pa nye dga' bo bdag cag ni grang bas sdug bsngal na/ khyod 'ba' zhig gyon nas 'chag gam/ des smras pa/ kho bos bkag gam ci/ khyed kyang ci phyir mi 'chag/ de rnams grang ba'i
100b4('dul ba): sdug bsngal gyis mtshan 'das par gyur pa'i skabs de/ dge slong dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'chag pa gang yin pa des
100b5('dul ba): gang zag gi gos bgos te bcag par bya'o/ / gzhan gyis 'chag na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon
100b6('dul ba): med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ / grang ba'i dus la bab pas/ dge slong rnams grang ba'i gnod pas glos phab ste 'dug go/ ji tsam na khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gtsug lag
100b7('dul ba): khang du 'ongs pa dang / des de dag mthong nas smras pa/ 'phags pa dag ci'i slad du gcig tu brtson pa'i gsung rab la glos phab ste bzhugs shing dge ba'i phyogs dag mi mdzad/ de dag gis
101a1('dul ba): smras pa/ khyim bdag bde ba dang ldan pa dag ni chos dran par 'gyur gyi/ za bo cag shin tu grang bas sdug bsngal bar gyur to// des khyim du song nas be'u ras lnga brgya
101a2('dul ba): bskur ba dang / dge slong rnams kyis khyim pa'i gos de dag bgos te/ phyi rol tu dong ba bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis mthong nas co 'dri zhing smras pa/ 'phags pa dag ci khyed babs sam/
101a3('dul ba): de dag gis smras pa/ kho bo cag gis grang bar gyur nas bgyis kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa dag de skad ma zer cig/ de rnams smod par byed pa'i skabs de/ dge slong dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la
101a4('dul ba): gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong gis khyim pa'i gos bgo bar mi bya'o// de lta bu'i rkyen zhig byung na/ steng du gos ngur smrig gis g.yogs nas bgo bar bya'o//
101a5('dul ba): dge 'dun gyi yang de bzhin du gyon par byed nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge 'dun gyi ni 'og tu gos bcug nas steng nas g.yogs te bgo bar bya'i/ gzhan du na 'gal tshabs
101a6('dul ba): can du 'gyur ro/ / // sdom ni/ gdugs dang 'jig rten rgyang 'phen dang // bsdebs sbyar de bzhin nags med dang // gnas med par ni lam dag dang // la ba bgos pas mi bcag pa'o//
101a7('dul ba): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// mnyan yod na bram ze gos spyod pa zhig 'dug pa de/ gos
101b1('dul ba): byas shing byas shing 'tshong bar byed do/ / dus gzhan zhig na des gos mang po rnyed par gyur nas/ des bsams pa/ thabs ji lta bu zhig byas na/ des bsod nams kyang 'thob cing rnyed pa
101b2('dul ba): yang 'grub par 'gyur snyam pa dang / de dad pa can zhig pas/ de'i blo skyes te/ sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun spyan drangs la/ gos kyi gdan bshams te/ gdugs tshod
101b3('dul ba): gsol lo/ / de ltar byas na gos kyang yongs su spyad par 'gyur la/ gos yongs su longs spyad pa dang / zhal zas yongs su longs spyad pas bsod nams chen po yang 'thob par 'gyur ro snyam du
101b4('dul ba): rig nas/ des sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun rang gi khyim du gdugs tshod la spyan drangs nas/ zhal zas gtsang zhing bsod pa bshams te/ gdan dag gi steng du gos bting ngo //
101b5('dul ba): de nas gdan bshams zin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das spyan 'dren gyis spyan drang na/ dge slong gi dge 'dun ni gshegs/ bcom ldan 'das ni gtsug lag khang na bzhugs shing bsod snyoms
101b6('dul ba): drangs so/ / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ rgyu rnam pa lngas gtsug lag khang na bzhugs shing bsod snyoms 'dren te/ lnga gang zhe na/ nang du yang dag 'jog bzhed par gyur pa dang / lha rnams
101b7('dul ba): la chos ston bzhed par gyur pa dang / nad pa gzigs bzhed par gyur pa dang / gnas mal gzigs bzhed par gyur pa dang / nyan thos rnams 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bzhed pa'o//
102a1('dul ba): don 'di la ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos rnams 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bzhed nas/ gtsug lag khang na bzhugs shing bsod snyoms drangs
102a2('dul ba): so/ / dge slong rnams lam kar char pa bab nas/ de dag gi gos char pas gsher bzhin du 'khod pas/ gang gi gos ci 'dra bas 'khod pa/ de'i de kho na lta bu'i sgra sgre byung bar gyur pa/ bram ze des
102a3('dul ba): mthong ba dang / 'khrugs nas smras pa/ bdag gi zong 'di lta bu dag zong du mi rung bar bgyis gyis/ gos 'di dag khyed thal byung snoms shig ces zer ba'i skabs de/ dge slong dag gis/ bco
102a4('dul ba): ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag bram ze des ma dad pa skyes nas byin pas blang bar mi bya'o// de 'khrugs pa de dang bral nas/ yang des dad pa'i
102a5('dul ba): sems kyis phul ba'i skabs de/ dge slong dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag da ni bram ze des dad pa'i sems kyis phul bas
102a6('dul ba): blang bar bya ste/ blangs nas kyang rung ba byas la bgo bar bya'o// dge slong dag gis blangs pa dang / bram ze des smras pa/ e ma'o 'phags pa dag gdugs bcang ba'i rigs so// skabs de dge slong
102a7('dul ba): ngag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gal te de lha na rjes su gnang ste/ dge slong dag gis gdugs bcang bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis
102b1('dul ba): dge slong dag gis gdugs bcang bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang / drug sde rnams kyis gdugs kyi rtsa ba gser dang / dngul dang / bai nuR+Ya dang / shes las byas shing / gzhan yang bkra zhing
102b2('dul ba): nyebar bkra ba dang / bsrubs pa las byas la/ gdugs ni dkar po dang / rma bya'i mdongs dag las byas pa dang / bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis mthong nas/ de dag gis smras pa/ 'phags pa
102b3('dul ba): dag 'di ci lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gdugs gnang ngo // 'phags pa dag dge sbyong khyed ci 'dod pa'i yon tan gyis gzir ram/ gang gi phyir 'di 'dra ba'i gdugs dag 'chang / de dag gis smras
102b4('dul ba): padagra bo rnams kyi mgrin pa rdog pas mnan nas 'dod pa'i yon tan gyis gzir to/ / de dag smod par byed pa'i skabs de/ dge slong dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan
102b5('dul ba): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bu'i gdugs dag bcang bar mi bya'i/ 'on kyang rtsa ba ru ta dang lo ma las byas pa'i gdugs rnam gnyis bcang bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis gdugs rnam
102b6('dul ba): gnyis bcang bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang / drug sde rnams kyis gdugs kyi rtsa ba ring po ring por byas nas/ gdugs kyi rtsa ba bsgreng ste grong khyer gyi nang du song ba dang / bram ze dang khyim bdag dag
102b7('dul ba): gis mthong nas/ 'di lta bu nor can nam/ tshong dpon nam/ ded dpon nam/ su zhig 'ong zhes langs nas rtog par byed do// kha cig sur dong ba dang / gang gi tshe mthong bar gyur pa de'i tshe ma dad
103a1('dul ba): par gyur pa'i skabs de/ dge slong dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gdugs kyi rtsa ba ring po ring por mi
103a2('dul ba): bya'i/ 'on kyang gdugs kyi tshad tsam gyi rtsa ba gdags par bya zhing / grong gi nang du gdugs thogs te 'gro bar mi bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis grong gi nang du gdugs thogs te 'gro bar mi bya'o/
103a3('dul ba): zhes bka' stsal pa dang / ji tsam na dge slong mang po dag don mthun dang lhan cig ljongs rgyu zhing dong ba dang / re zhig na grong du lam byung bar gyur nas/ de dag gis bsams pa/ bcom ldan 'das
103a4('dul ba): kyis grong gi nang du gdugs thogs te 'gro bar mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal pas/ grong dor bar bya'o snyam nas de dag gis grong spangs pa dang / don mthun rnams dang bral bas chom pos bcom pa'i skabs de
103a5('dul ba): dge slong dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gal te grong gi dbus su lam byung bar gyur na gdugs glor bsnyal nas 'dong bar bya ste/ 'di
103a6('dul ba): la 'gyod par mi bya'o/ / bsod snyoms pa rnams bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang / char pa bab nas char chus gos gsher bar gyur pa'i skabs de/ dge slong dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol
103a7('dul ba): pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bsod snyoms pas gdugs kyi rtsa ba rung bar byas nas 'jug par bya ste/ zhugs nas gal te char pa chad na/ gdugs khyim dang por bzhag
103b1('dul ba): la 'jug par bya zhing / de nas phyir blangs te 'gro bar bya'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// lce/
103b2('dul ba): phyogs kyi yul nas kun tu rgyu 'jig rten rgyang 'phen pa 'char ba zhes bya ba zhig ljongs rgyu zhing mnyan yod du 'ongs so// de ngal bso nas tshe dang ldan pa kun shes ko'u di n+ya ga la ba der song ste phyin nas smras pa/
103b3('dul ba): kye dge slong kho bos bla ma dag las blangs pa'i yi ge cung zad yod de/ de'i phyir khyod dang lhan cig gtam bya bar 'dod do// des de la smras pa/ bram ze kho bo smra ba don du gnyer ba ma yin gyis song zhig
103b4('dul ba): de tshe dang ldan pa rta thul dang / bzang po dang / rlangs pa dang / ming chen dang / grags pa dang / gang po dang / dri med dang / ba lang bdag dang / lag bzangs ga la ba der song ba dang
103b5('dul ba): rnams kyis kyang de kho na skad smras so/ / de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra'i bu ga la ba der song ste phyin nas smras pa/ kye dge slong kho bos bla ma las yi ge cung zad blangs pa dag yod de/ de'i phyir khyod dang lhan
103b6('dul ba): cig gtam bya bar 'dod do/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bsams pa/ ci kun tu rgyu 'di la dge ba'i rtsa ba cung zad yong dam 'on te med snyam na/ yod par mthong ngo // su la rag las brtags na/ bdag nyid
103b7('dul ba): la'o/ ci smra bas 'dul ba gzhan cung zad yod dam snyam na/ yod par mthong ngo // ji tsam na tshogs pa brtags na/ zhag bdun tshun chad kyis tshogs par shes nas smras pa/ legs te de
104a1('dul ba): bzhin bya na rig pa'i gnas gang du bya/ che ge mo zhig tu'o// smra ba'i zhal che ba bzhag ste/ phyogs snga ma dang phyi ma rnam par bzhag nas/ sus phyogs snga ma/ sus gzugs
104a2('dul ba): zhes glengs pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus smras pa/ kun tu rgyu glo bur du 'ongs pa yin pas 'di nyid kyis phyogs snga ma tshugs shig/ kun tu rgyus phyogs snga ma smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i
104a3('dul ba): bus bzlas nas/ khyod kyi 'di ni mi rigs so// 'di ni mi 'dra'o// 'di ni mi 'thad do zhes skyon btags so// des yang smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus mjug tu ma phyin par bzhag
104a4('dul ba): go/ lho phyogs kyi yul nas kun tu rgyu 'jig rten rgyang 'phen pa 'char ba zhes bya ba zhig mnyan yod du 'ongs te/ de tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang lhan cig brtsad nas/ deng du zhag bdun lon no zhes
104a5('dul ba): kun tu sgra grags pa dang / srogs chags brgya phrag mang po dag kha cig ni ya mtshan skyes/ kha cig ni sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dag gis bskul nas 'dus pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus
104a6('dul ba): bsams pa/ bdag gi smra bas 'dul ba 'dus snyam snyam na/ 'dus par mthong ngo // de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus ma lus par smras pa dang / kun tu rgyu de tshar bcad do// de nas mngon
104a7('dul ba): par dad par gyur te smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu bdag gis legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po 'thob na/ bdag
104b1('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad do/ / de tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus rab tu phyung / bsnyen par rdzogs par byas te/ gdams ngag byin no// des brtsol ba dang / 'bad pa dang
104b2('dul ba): bsgrim pa byas pas/ 'khor ba'i 'khor lo cha lnga pa g.yo ba dang mi g.yo ba 'di nyid rig ste zhes bya ba nas/ gus par smra bar bya bar gyur to zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no// de nas 'khor de
104b3('dul ba): dag 'phags pa shA ri'i bus 'di lta bu'i smra ba chen po pham par byas so zhes shin tu ya mtshan skyes so/ / de tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'khor de dag gi bsam pa dang / bag la nya la dang /
104b4('dul ba): khams dang / rang bzhin rtogs nas/ de dag dang mthun par chos bstan te/ srog chags 'bum phrag mang po dag gis de thos nas/ lhag pa'i khyad par chen po thob pa 'di lta ste/ kha cig
104b5('dul ba): gis ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas/ kha cig gis ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu/ kha cig gis ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba nas/ dge 'dun la gzhol
104b6('dul ba): zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no/ / skabs de dge slong dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag thams cad du dge slong shA ri'i
104b7('dul ba): bu'am/ shA ri'i bu dang 'dra bar mi 'gyur bas/ de lta bas na gnang gis/ dge slong dag gis 'jig rten rgyang 'phen pa la sogs pa phyi rom pa'i bstan bcos bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan
105a1('dul ba): 'das kyis dge slong dag gis 'jig rten rgyang 'phen pa la sogs pa phyi rol pa'i bstan bcos bslab par bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong byis pa 'am/ rmongs pa 'am/
105a2('dul ba): mi gsal ba dang / mi mkhas pa dag gis kyang thams cad kyis khyad par med par bslabs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ phas kyi rgol ba tshar gcod nus pa gang yin pa de dag gis
105a3('dul ba): 'jig rten rgyang 'phen pa la sogs pa phyi rol pa'i bstan bcos bslab par bya'i/ byis pa dang / rmongs pa dang / mi gsal ba dang / mi mkhas pa dag gis ni ma yin no// de rnams de la brtson pa
105a4('dul ba): nyid du gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dus gsum du byas la/ dus gnyis ni sangs rgyas kyi gsung rab klog par bya zhing / gsum pa la ni phyi rol pa'i bstan bcos
105a5('dul ba): dag go/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dus gsum du byas zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong rnams lo dang zla ba'i dus dag tu slob par byed nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge
105a6('dul ba): slong dag tshe ni skad cig ma yin pas/ ngas lo dang zla ba'i dus las dgongs te ma gsungs kyi/ 'on kyang nyin gcig la cha gsum du bya'o// dge slong rnams gsal ba'i dus su ni phyi rol pa'i
105a7('dul ba): bstan bcos 'don la/ gzhan dag tu ni sangs rgyas kyi gsung rab 'don nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gsal ba'i dus su sangs rgyas kyi gsung rab gdon par bya ste/
105b1('dul ba): phyi rol pa'i bstan bcos ni ma yin no// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// tshe dang ldan pa
105b2('dul ba): shA ri'i bus bram ze'i khye'u lha sbyin dang / ba lang 'byor gnyis rab tu byung nas/ de dag tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus mdo sde 'don du bcug go/ ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na ljongs rgyu zhing dong
105b3('dul ba): nas ri brags shig tu phyin pa dang / der de dag la rnyed pa dang bkur sti chen po byung nas/ de gnyis der 'khod do// de gnyis sngon goms pa'i shugs kyis sangs rgyas kyi gsung rab bsngab
105b4('dul ba): sbyor dang / tshig dang rim par sbyar nas/ kha ton du 'don no// de dag las gcig ni shi'o// cig shes kyis gzhung brjed par gyur nas/ de la kha ton las byung ba'i rnyed pa med nas/
105b5('dul ba): de dang de dag tu 'khyam 'khyam nas phyir mnyan yod du 'ongs so// de nas ngal ba sos te/ tshe dang ldan pa kun shes ko'u de n+ya ga la ba der song ste/ phyag byas nas smras pa/ gnas brtan
105b6('dul ba): g.yar ton dpog tu gsol/ des smras pa/ bu legs so// de bzhin kha ton bslab bo zhes des de dang lhan cig kha tor bya bar brtsams pa dang / kha ton thung ngur 'don nas smras pa
105b7('dul ba): gnas brtan khyod kyis ring por ma bton pas gdon nongs so/ / des smras pa/ bu kho bos de ltar bslabs so// des de'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa
106a1('dul ba): rta thul dang / bzang po dang / rlangs pa dang / ming chen dang / grags pa dang / gang po dang / dri med dang / ba lang bdag dang / lag bzangs ga la ba der song
106a2('dul ba): ste byin nas/ rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te smras pa/ gnas brtan g.yar ton dpog shu gsol/ des smras pa/ bu legs so// de bzhin kha ton bslab par bya'o zhes des de dang lhan cig kha ton gdon
106a3('dul ba): bar brtsams pa dang / de nas kha ton thung ngur bton nas smras pa/ gnas brtan khyod kyis gdon nongs so// des smras pa/ bu kho bos de ltar bslabs so// des de'i rkang pa la phyag byas nas
106a4('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ga la ba der song ste byin nas/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i rkang pa la phyag byas nas/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// mkhan po g.yar ton dbog tu
106a5('dul ba): gsol/ des smras pa/ bu legs so// de bzhin du kha ton bslab bo// des de dang lhan cig kha ton bya bar brtsams pa dang / ji tsam na kha ton ring por bton nas/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i
106a6('dul ba): bus kyang ring por bton pa dang / des smras pa/ mkhan po dge slong de dag kun gyis ni gdon nongs kyi/ khyod nyag gcig gis ma nyams par bton to// des smras pa/ mi blun po khyod nyid kyis
106a7('dul ba): gdon nyes kyi/ dge slong dag gis ni me nyams par bton to zhes des spyos nas/ cang mi smra bar 'dug pa'i skabs de/ dge slong dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan
106b1('dul ba): 'das kyis dgongs pa/ nyes dmigs cung zad gang byung ba ni/ dge slong rnams sangs rgyas kyi gsung bsdeb sbyar dang / tshig dang rim pa sbyar nas 'don pa las gyur gyis/ de lta bas na dge slong
106b2('dul ba): gis sangs rgyas kyi gsung rab bsdeb sbyar dang / tshig dang rim pa sbyar nas gdon par mi bya'o// dge slong gis sangs rgyas kyi gsung rab bsde ba sbyar dang / tshig dang rim pa sbyar nas 'don na
106b3('dul ba): 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ / yul gyi nges pa'i tshig dang / skad kyi nges pa'i tshig dang / ljongs kyi nges pa'i tshig yin na ltung ba med do// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan
106b4('dul ba): yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ / drug sde rnams rgas pa'i gnas skabs na yang rgod pa byed pa dang / dge slong de dag gis smras pa/ tshe dang
106b5('dul ba): ldan pa dag khyed mgo skyes kyang da dung rgod bag mo gtong ngam/ de dag cang mi smra bar 'khod nas/ mtha' gcig tu dong ste smras pa/ dga' bo nye dga' lhung bzed nag po can kos thag pa 'di dag
106b6('dul ba): la mi dga' ba zhig bya'o zhes/ de dag de ltar grags tshol ba la brtson par 'khod pa na/ dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan dag dgon pa'i gnas su dong ste/ bsam gtan dang klog par bya ba
106b7('dul ba): dag brtsams so/ / de nas drug sde rnams kyis gnas gsum nas nags mes btang ste/ ngos cig tu 'dus nas bsdad pa dang / dge slong rnams nags mes tshig pa'i gnod pa byung bas
107a1('dul ba): rings pa rings par 'bros par brtsams so/ / drug sde rnams kyis smras pa/ gnas brtan dag ci'i slad du rings rings lhar bzhud/ tshe dang ldan pa dag nags kyi me ma
107a2('dul ba): mthong ngam/ gnas brtan dag bcom ldan 'das kyis bde ba'i gnas skabs su tshul khrims gsungs sam ci lags zhes cung zad bgad pa dang / de dag gis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag
107a3('dul ba): khyed kyis kho bo cag la bsams bzhin du ma gtses grang / bkren pa dag khyed de ltar mi dga' bar bya'o zhes zer ba'i skabs de/ dge slong dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /
107a4('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong gis nags mas gtang bar mi bya'o// gtong na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal
107a5('dul ba): bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ / mnyan yod na dge slong rgan po zhig dang / gsar bu zhig ljongs rgyu zhing dong ba dang / rgan po la ni snod mang zhing
107a6('dul ba): yo byad mngal/ gsar bu ni ma grangs shing chos gos gsum las lhag pa med pa zhig pas/ rgan pos smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa kho bo ngal gyis/ re zhig chos gos kyi gtur bu khyer te
107a7('dul ba): shog cig/ gsar bu des smras pa/ gnas brtan dka' bab par mi 'gyur na/ re zhig cung zad cig gsol ba mchis so// tshe dang ldan pa 'di la su zhig gshe smros shig/ gnas
107b1('dul ba): brtan sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun ma gzigs sam ci/ rmongs pa'i yo byad 'dis ci zhig bgyi/ bzhin bzangs gal te mi bkur ba ni re zhig rung na/ 'di dri bar bya ste/
107b2('dul ba): khyod kho bo'i mkhan po 'am/ slob dpon yin nam/ ci gang gi phyir rjes su ston par byed/ de cang mi smra bar 'dug pa dang / rgan pos bsams pa/ bkren pa 'di mi dga' bar bya'o snyam
107b3('dul ba): mo/ ji tsam na de gnyis gtsug lag khang du dong ba dang / de na nub gcig kyang mi gnas par 'dug par mi bya ba'i khrims su bya ba yod de/ de gnyis la gnas mal gyi zhal ta byed pas
107b4('dul ba): gnas mal dag snoms shig ces smras pa dang / rgan pos ni zangs so// gsar bu des smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa kho bos gnas ma bcas kyis/ je gnas gsol lo zhes de dge
107b5('dul ba): 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyi gan du song ste/ rkang pa la phyag 'tshal nas smras pa/ gnas brtan bdag gi gnas mdzad du gsol/ des smras pa/ bzhin bzangs khyod su dang lhan cig
107b6('dul ba): 'ongs gnas brtan dge slong che ge mo zhig dang ngo / / bzhin bzangs de dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis bdag 'khor dang phye'o zhes zer du 'ong gis/ song la de nyid la gnas gsol zhig/ de gzhan
107b7('dul ba): ngag gi gan du song ba dang / thams cad kyis de bzhin spangs nas/ nam sros te rgan po de nyid kyi gan du song nas sgo la brdabs te smras pa/ gnas brtan phyag 'tshal lo// khyod su
108a1('dul ba): zhig bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba de lags so/ / khyod nad med par gyur cig/ gnas brtan gtsug lag khang 'di na nub gcig kyang mi gnas par mchis par mi bgyi ba'i
108a2('dul ba): khrims su mdzad pa mchis na/ bdag gi gnas mdzad du gsol/ bzhin bzangs dge 'dun gyis de lta bu'i khrims su bca' ba mdzad pa legs te/ gal te ma mdzad na kho bos 'char gzhug pa
108a3('dul ba): zhig/ de'i tshe ni kho bo snod mang zhing / yo byad mang ba yin la/ da ni gnas brtan yin nam/ khyod ma gus pa byas kyang gnas ster ba gang yin pa de la gnas chos shig/ de spobs pa me
108a4('dul ba): gyur nas/ cang mi smra bar 'dug ste/ de'i gnas bar chad du gyur pa'i skabs de/ dge slong dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gnas/
108a5('dul ba): med par ljongs rgyu zhing 'gro bar mi bya/ dge slong gis seng ge bzhin gtum por mi bya/ dge 'dun gyis kyang / dge slong rnams la gnod par 'gyur ba'i khrims bca' bar mi bya ste/ dge slong ga
108a6('dul ba): ma bcas par ljongs rgyu zhing 'gro 'am/ seng ge bzhin gtum por byed dam/ dge 'dun gyis khrims su bya ba de lta bu bcas na/ thams cad 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// sangs
108a7('dul ba): rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhab 'bring ba tshe dang ldan pa klu skyong dang yul ma ga d+har ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs te/ grong khyer sa dkar can du gshegs nas/ sa dkar can na gnod sbyin pa ku la'i gnas
108b1('dul ba): na bzhugs so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das mtshan mo nam sros te/ mun gnag cing khad kyis cung zad cung zad char 'bab cing glog 'byung ba na/ bla gab med pa'i 'chags na 'chag pa
108b2('dul ba): mdzad do/ / chos nyid kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi zham 'bring ba dge slong rnams ni/ ji srid sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams nang du yang dag 'jog la mi bzhugs pa de srid
108b3('dul ba): du yang dag 'jog la mi 'jug go/ / brgya byin lha'i dbang po'i shes pa dang mthong ba ni 'og tu 'jug pa yin pas/ des bsams pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de grong khyer sa dkar can na/
108b4('dul ba): sa dkar can gyi ri gnod sbyin pa ku la'i gnas na bzhugs shing / de mtshan mo nam sros te mun gnag cing khad kyis cung zad cung zad char 'bab cing grog 'byung ba na/ bla gab med pa'i 'chags
108b5('dul ba): na 'chag ste/ ma la bdag der nye bar 'gro'o snyam du rig nas/ bai DUR+Ya las byas pa'i dri gtsang khang mngon par sprul te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das
108b6('dul ba): 'chag pa mdzad pa'i zham 'bring na 'chag cing 'dug go/ de'i tshe yul ma ga d+ha pa'i mi rnams khye'u dang bu mo ngu ba gang yin pa de dag la/ de ne ba ku la'i ming gis bsdigs par
108b7('dul ba): byed do/ / de nas tshe dang ldan pa klu skyong 'di snyam du bsams te/ kye ma bcom ldan 'das ha cang yun ring du bla gab med pa'i 'chags na 'ag pa mdzad pas/ ma la bdag gis de la
109a1('dul ba): gnod sbyin pa ku las bsdigs so snyam du rig nas/ la ba bzlog ste bgos nas 'chag pa'i slad du 'dug ste/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//
109a2('dul ba): ba ku la ba ku la/ dge sbyong nga ni gnod sbyin pa ku la yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa klu skyong la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// mi blun po khyod kyang de bzhin
109a3('dul ba): gshegs pa la gnod sbyin pa ku las bsdigs par sems sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni bsnyengs pa dang / bag tsha ba dang
109a4('dul ba): bral ba ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa la bsnyengs pa 'am/ zhum pa 'am/ spu zing zhes byed pa mi mnga' 'o// de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin ma dad par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das
109a5('dul ba): la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / btsun pa chos 'dul ba 'di la 'di 'dra ba'i gang zag kyang mchis sam/ ko'u shi ka khyod sdod cig/ go'u ta ma'i rigs ni rgya che ba yin pas/ 'di yang byis
109a6('dul ba): rnam par dag pa'i chos can du 'gyur ro/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ nyes dmigs gang cung zad byung ba ni/ dge slong dag la ba bzlog sde gyon pa las gyur par mkhyen nas/ dge slong
109a7('dul ba): rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag mi blun po klu skyong gis la ba bzlog ste bgos nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa la/ ba ku la ba ku la/ dge sbyong ba ni gnod sbyin pa ku la yin no zhes
109b1('dul ba): zer te/ re lta bas na dge slong gi sa la ba bzlog ste bgo bar mi bya'o// gyon na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gi sa la ba bzlog ste bgo bar mi bya'o// gyon na
109b2('dul ba): 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ / zhes bka' sprul pa dang / dge slong ba lang gi gnas na 'khod pa de dag gis deral ba'i bgo ba dag rnyed pa dang / de dag la shig zhugs te/ dge slong
109b3('dul ba): rnams shig gis zos pas bde ba mi thob pa'i skabs de/ dge slong dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ la ba bzlog ste gyor
109b4('dul ba): pas 'dug par bya'o/ / nyal bar bya'i/ bcag par ni mi bya'o// // sdom ni/ be'u ras dang ni la ba dang // de bzhin la ba'i mchog dang ni// sgrog mig sgrog rten mdud pa dang
109b5('dul ba): ska rags dag ni gsum yin no/ / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan
109b6('dul ba): bdas kyis/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag gal te dge 'dun la be'u ras grub na yang gnang la/ gang zag la yang gnang ngo // sangs rgyas bcom ldan
109b7('dul ba): 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs shing / snga ma bzhin te/ dge 'dun la lab grub na yang gnang la/ gang zag la yang gnang
110a1('dul ba): ngo/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs shing / snga ma bzhin te/ da
110a2('dul ba): 'dun la la ba mchog grub na yang gnang la/ gang zag la yang gnang ngo // sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga'
110a3('dul ba): ra ba na bzhugs so/ / mnyan yod na dge slong bsod snyoms pa zhig 'dug pa de/ snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos bgos/ lhung bzed thogs te/ mnyan yod du bsod snyoms kyi phyir
110a4('dul ba): zhugs so/ / de bsod snyoms kyi phyir rgyu ba na/ chos gos nar nas/ des myur ba myur bar lhung bzed sa la bzhag nas/ de tshags byas pa dang / de bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis
110a5('dul ba): mthong nas 'phya zhing / dge sbyong shAkya'i bu rnams ni gtsang sbra med de/ lhung bzod bab bab tu 'jog go zhes pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba
110a6('dul ba): dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong gis lhung bzed khab bab tu gzhag par mi bya'o// dge slong lhung bzed pa ba bab tu 'jog na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro//
110a7('dul ba): 'on kyang chos gos bsrung ba'i phyir chos gos kyi sgrog mig gdags par bya'o// dge slong rnams kyis btags pa dang / des chos gos ral nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
110b1('dul ba): slog zungs kyis glon la thogs shig/ dge slong rnams kyis sgrog zungs kyis glan nas btags pa dang / de sgrog mdud med pas/ ma chags te nyes dmigs de nyid du gyur pa dang / bcom
110b2('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mdud pa bya'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so//
110b3('dul ba): mnyan yod na dge slong bsod snyoms pa zhig 'dug pa de/ snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos bgos/ lhung bzed thogs te/ mnyan yod du bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs so// de bsod snyoms kyi
110b4('dul ba): phyir rgyu ba na/ smad g.yogs snyil ba dang / des myur ba myur bar lhung bzed sa la bzhag ste/ de tshags bcos so// bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis mthong nas zhes bya ba snga ma bzhin no//
110b5('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos gos bsrung ba'i phyir/ ska rags rnam pa gsum po/ shur bu dang / shur bu phre'u dang / lcag bong bcang bar bya'o//
110b6('dul ba): / bam po bdun pa// / sdom ni ston pa ser skya'i gnas bzhugs pas// rgyan spel ma dang byang phrul can// zla gam dang ni gser skud can// khra bo thams cad bkag pa
110b7('dul ba): yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gnas na n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// de'i tshe shAkya ming chen gyi khyim gyi zhal ta ba dus las 'das pa dang / ri brags
111a1('dul ba): na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs/ shAkya ming chen ga la ba der song ste smras pa/ rje khyod kyi khab kyi zhal ta pa gum na/ zhal ta pa gzhan zhig bsgo bar gsol/ des de'i
111a2('dul ba): drung na bram ze'i khye'u zhig 'dug pa de la smras pa/ bram ze'i khye'u re zhig khyod song zhig/ ji tsam na zhal ta pa gzhan zhig btang ngo // de song nas des chos bzhin du rigs par spyad pas/ dpya nar ma
111a3('dul ba): dang / bla skyes rab tu mang por phul ba dang / shAkya ming chen gyis smras pa/ bram ze'i khye'u dpya nar ma dang / bla skyes 'di ltar mang ba/ khyod kyis skye bo'i tshogs la gnod par ma byas grang /
111a4('dul ba): des smras pa/ rje dpya nar ma dang / bla skyes 'di rigs pas mchis pa lags te/ bdag gis skye bo'i tshogs la gnod pa bgyis pa ma lags so// des ri brags na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs de la rmas
111a5('dul ba): pa/ shes ldan dag bram ze'i khye'u 'dis/ khyed 'ga' la gnod pa ma byas grang / rje dpya nar ma dang / bla skyes 'di rigs pas mchis pa lags te/ 'dis 'ga' la yang gnod pa ma bgyis so zhes
111a6('dul ba): smras pa dang / des de ri brags kyi zhal ta bar bcug go// 'jig rten ni 'byor pa 'dod cing / rgud pa dang mi mthun pa yin pas/ de la bram ze gzhan zhig gis bu mo byin pa dang / des de nyi ma dang / chos
111a7('dul ba): grangs dang / yud tsam dang sbyar nas bag mar blangs so// de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' dgur spyod par byed de/ de rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' dgur spyod
111b1('dul ba): par byed pa las bu khye'u zhig btsas te/ de btsas pa'i btsas skon rgya cher byas nas/ rigs dang mthun pa'i ming btags so// yang de rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' dgur spyod par byed pa las bu mo
111b2('dul ba): zhig btsas te/ de'i btsas ston yang rgya cher byas nas/ ming zla ba zhes bya bar btags so// de bskyed bsrings te chen mor gyur pa dang / de mkhas shing spyod lam dang 'gro 'dug 'o bze bas/ ri
111b3('dul ba): zags na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs thams cad kyi yid du 'ong bar gyur to/ / ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na bram ze'i khye'u de na par gyur nas/ rtsa ba dang / sdong bu dang / lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu'i
111b4('dul ba): sman gyis rim gro byas kyang / nad de zhi bar ma gyur nas/ ri brags pa des dpya nar ma dang / tha skyes phul ba gang yin pa de dag thams cad spyad cing / skyin po gzhan dag blangs nas/ 'on kyang sos
111b5('dul ba): par ma gyur nas/ de de nyid du dus las 'das so// ri brags na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs dag shAkya ming chen ga la ba der 'ongs te smras pa/ rje zhal ta pa de ni gum lags so// des smras pa/ shes
111b6('dul ba): ldan dag de na dpya nar ma dang / bla skyes su phul ba yod dam/ rje te por mang du phul mod kyi/ des zo 'tshal ba'i yo byad du spyad na/ 'on kyang sos par ma gyur nas/ sbyin po gzhan dag kyang bgyis so//
111b7('dul ba): deng la de na lhag ma cung zad ci yod pa des bu lon sobs shig/ rje de na cung zad kyang ma mchis te/ lus par btab na/ de'i mchis brang dang / bu pho dang / bu mo mchis te/ de'i bu mo de mkhas
112a1('dul ba): shi'i stong la ma dang 'gro 'dug 'obs pa lags pas/ ri thags na gnas pa'i rgya ba tshogs thams cad kyi yid dul bar gyur to// m-i na gyis smras hA/ shes ldan dag
112a2('dul ba): chung ma dang bu po dag ci dgar thong la/ bu mo de 'dir khug cig/ de rnams kyis de'i chung ma dang bu po de dag ci dgar btang nas/ bu mo de ming chen gyi gan du khrid do// shAkya ming chen gyi chung ma rgan mo zhig
112a3('dul ba): zas g.yo ba dang me tog thu ba'i las rnam gnyis byed pa des smras pa/ jo bo da ni bdag shin tu rgas pas sug las rnam gnyis bgyid rngo mo thog na/ zla ba 'di bdag gi den grogs su bskor gsol/ des
112a4('dul ba): de ngan grogs su bskos so/ / des de la smras pa/ zla ba khyod ni kun dga' ra bar song la me tog thus shig/ ngas ni kha zas g.yo'o// de kun dga'i ra bar song nas me tog btus te/ de nas 'phreng ba legs
112a5('dul ba): par brgyus nas/ ming chen gyi gan du song ba dang / des mthong nas yongs su dga' ste smras pa/ legs so zhog cig ces smras nas/ chung ma rgan mo de la 'di skad ces smras so// ci'i phyir sngon ni me
112a6('dul ba): tog nyung la/ de ring mang bar gyur/ des smras pa/ sngon ni khyod kyi gnyen dag mchis nas/ bdag la slong ba na/ bdag gis de dag la stsal la/ 'dis ni su la yang ma stsal ba dang / bdag ni rgas
112a7('dul ba): bas mig rdul la/ 'di ni mig rno bas thu mkhas pa las gyur to// des smras pa/ gal te de lta na de kun dga'i re bar thong la der zhog cig/ des de kun dga'i ra ba de nyid du bzhag pa dang / de ma
112b1('dul ba): tog gi 'phreng ba bzang po rgyud par byed pas/ de'i ming 'phreng ldan ma 'phreng ldan ma zhes bya bar grags so// dus gzhan zhig na khyim nas rang gi zan blangs te/ kun dga' ra bar song ba dang / bcom ldan 'das
112b2('dul ba): kyang bsod snyoms la gshegs so/ / des bcom ldan 'das sku blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas/ shin tu bde zhing rab tu dga' bas rtogs par byed cing bsams pa/ 'di lta bu'i yon gnas yang
112b3('dul ba): dag pa la bdag gis bya ba ma byas pas/ des na bdag 'di lta bu'i gnas skabs su gyur par gdon ma zos so// de'i phyir gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag las bsod snyoms bzhed na/ bdag gis bcom
112b4('dul ba): ldan 'das la dbul lo snyam pa dang / skabs de lta bu la/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mi mkhyen pa dang / mi gzigs pa dang / mi rig pa dang / rnam par mi mkhyen pa ci yang mi mnga' bas
112b5('dul ba): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos nyid kyis zhes bya ba nas/ lus can rnams la 'bras bur smin/ zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de rjes su gzung ba'i phyir lhung
112b6('dul ba): bzed bzed de/ sring mo khyod kyis gal te yongs su btang na/ lhung bzed 'dir byin cig ces bka' stsal pa dang / des shin tu dad pas bcom ldan 'das la bsod snyoms de phul nas zhabs gnyis la
112b7('dul ba): phyag 'tshal te/ smon lam btab pa/ bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa 'dis/ zan mo dang dbul por mi 'gyur bar shog cig/ ji tsam na de'i pha'i grogs po bram ze mtshan mkhan zhig yod pa des/ de
113a1('dul ba): mthong nas smras pa/ bu mo khyod ga las 'ongs/ ri brags de kho na nas so// su la gnas shing 'dug/ des smras pa/ gang na skal pa chung ngu gnas pa na ste/ bdag
113a2('dul ba): ming chen gyis bran mor bgyis so/ / khyod kyi pha de gar song / gum mo// ma dang ming po de dag gar dong / gar mchis ma 'tshal lo// zla ba khyod bran mo'i 'os ma yin na lag pa rkyong zhig dang blta'o//
113a3('dul ba): des lag pa brkyang ba dang / des bltas nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ gang gi lag pa'i mthil dag la// lcags kyi 'khor lo'i mtshan yod pa// bran gyi rigs su skyes gyur kyang // rgyal po'i
113a4('dul ba): btsun mor ba zhes par 'gyur/ / gang gi bzhin ni rgyas pa dang // ngang pa'i rgyal po'i gdangs 'dra ba// bran gyi rigs su skyes gyur kyang // rgyal po'i btsun mor bzhes par 'gyur// gang gi rkang pa'i mthil/
113a5('dul ba): dag la// grong khyer cog dang rta babs bcas// bran gyi rigs su skyes gyur kyang // rgyal po'i btsun mor ba zhes par 'gyur// khyod mi dga' ba ma byed par song zhig dang / khyod bran mor mi 'gyur gyi/ khyod
113a6('dul ba): rgyal po'i btsun mor 'gyur ro/ / de gnas de nas skyed mos tshal du song ba dang / yul ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal ri dgas shor du song ba rtas kha khyer te/ gcig pu ser skya'i gnas su phyin to// de
113a7('dul ba): phan tshun 'khyam pa las/ ming chen gyi kun dga' ra bar son nas/ des bu mo de la dris pa/ bu mo 'di su'i kun dga' ra ba yin/ des smras pa/ lha shAkya ming chen gyi lags so// des
113b1('dul ba): las babs te smras pa/ bu mo rkang pa bkrus chu long zhig/ des shin tu myur bar rdzing bur song ste/ nyi ma'i 'od gzer gyis bsros pa'i chu blangs pa dang / des rkang pa bkrus nas/ yud tsam
113b2('dul ba): zhig bsdad de smras pa/ bu mo gdong bkrus chu long zhig/ des chu'i snying rim lag pas bsal te/ chu ha cang dro ba yang ma yin/ ha cang grang ba yang ma yin pa blangs nas/ des gdong bkrus
113b3('dul ba): so/ / des yang smras pa/ bu mo btung dgos kyis chu long zhig/ des chu rnam par glongs te/ chu bsil ba lo ma'i snod du blangs pa/ rgyal pos 'thungs nas smras pa/ bu mo kun dga' ra ba
113b4('dul ba): 'di na rdzing bu gsum yod dam ci na/ khyod kyis chu rnam pa gsum khyer te 'ongs/ des smras pa/ lha 'di na rdzing bu gcig kho na mchis kyis/ gsum ni ma mchis so// des smras pa/ 'o
113b5('dul ba): na khyod kyis chu rnam pa gsum ga las khyer te 'ongs/ des ji ltar gyur pa brjod pa dang / rgyal pos smras pa/ de ni go'o// 'di dri bar bya ste/ ci'i phyir khyod kyis chu rnam pa gsum khyer
113b6('dul ba): te 'ongs/ des smras pa/ lha bdag gis dang por chab dron po 'tshal te mchis pa ni/ lha mnyel bsngos par bgyi ba'i slad du'o// slad kyis ha cang dro ba yang ma lags/ ha cang grang
113b7('dul ba): ba yang ma lags pa 'tshal te mchis pa ni/ dro ba dang grang ba gang lags pa dag spyan la gnod pa spang ba'i slad du'o// rnam par glongs nas shin tu bsil ba 'tshal te mchis pa ni/
114a1('dul ba): lha skyems pa dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du'o// des bsams pa/ bu mo 'di ni mkhas pa yin no snyam du rig nas smras pa/ bu mo mdzangs shing mkhas pa khyod rkang pa ma
114a2('dul ba): dgos kyis/ re zhig mal chos shig/ des de'i rkang pa mnyes pa dang / de reg bya dang ldan pa yin pas/ mnyes ma thag nyid du de gnyid log go// de gnyid log pa dang / des bsams pa/ rgyal
114a3('dul ba): po 'di dag la ni dgra mang bas/ gal te 'di gnyid log pa la 'ga' zhig gis gnod pa byas na/ nges par bdag gi rje bo la grags pa ma yin par 'gyur bas/ sgo gcad par bya'o snyam nas/ des
114a4('dul ba): sgo bcad de 'dug pa dang / ji tsam na gcig nas gcig tu thos te/ dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa dag skyed mos tshal der lhags nas/ de rnams sgo phye zhes zer ro// des sgo ma phye ba dang
114a5('dul ba): rgyal po ku co'i sgras sad nas smras pa/ bu mo de ci zhig/ des smras pa/ lha mi dag cig cha ba sgo phye zhes mchis shing / lha'i mtshan kyang smos so// des smras pa/ bu mo sgo 'di sus bcad/
114a6('dul ba): lha bdag gis bkum mo// ci'i phyir bcad/ lha bdag gi glo ba la rgyal po 'di dag la ni dgra mang bas/ gal te 'di ma rnal log pa la 'ga' zhig gis gnod pa bgyis na/ nges par bdag gi rje bo
114a7('dul ba): la grags pa ma lags par 'gyur ro snyam nas/ de'i slad du bdag gis chab sgo bkum mo// des smras pa/ bu mo mdzangs ma mo khyod la nga'i the tshom 'di 'dri bar bya ste/ re zhig khyad
114b1('dul ba): ming chen gyi cir 'ong smros shig/ des smras pa/ bdag de'i mngag gzhug bgyid pa'i bran mo lags so// khyod de'i mngag gzhug byed pa'i bran mo ma yin gyi/ khyod nges par de'i bu mo yin gyis
114b2('dul ba): drang por smros shig/ de cang mi smra bar 'dug pa dang / rgyal pos smras pa/ bu mo khyod ming chen gyi gan du song la/ rgyal po gsal rgyal khyod kyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so zhes byos shig/
114b3('dul ba): de myur ba myur bas song ste/ jo bo ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal khyod kyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so zhes smras so// shAkya ming chen gyis thos nas/ bza' ba dang / btung ba dang
114b4('dul ba): dri dang / 'brang ba dag bshams nas skye bo phal po ches bskor te/ kun dga'i ra bar song ngo // de nas gcig la gcig byon pa legs so zhes bya ba'i tshig gis kun tu spyad pas
114b5('dul ba): so so yang dag par dga' bar byas nas/ rgyal pos khrus byas shing zan zos nas/ gtam dag byas te/ yud tsam zhig bsdad nas smras pa/ ming chen bu mo 'di khyod kyi cir 'ong /
114b6('dul ba): lha mngag gzhug bgyid pa'i bran mo lags so// 'di khyod kyi mngag gzhug byed pa'i bran mo ma yin gyi/ 'di khyod kyi bu mo yin gyis/ nga la byin cig/ des smras pa/ lha shAkya'i bu mo
114b7('dul ba): gzhan 'di bas ches khyad par du 'phags pa dag mchis na de dag pazhes su gsol/ 'di cir 'tshal/ rgyal pos smras pa/ 'di nyid nga la dgos kyis/ 'di nga la byin cig/ des
115a1('dul ba): smras pa/ lha gal te de lta na tshul bzhin bgyis te dbul lo// de bzhin byos shig/ de nas shAkya ming chen gyis grong khyer mdzes par byed du bcug ste/ bu mo de rgyan
115a2('dul ba): thams cad kyis klubs nas/ glang po che la bskyon te/ lam po che dang / srang dang / lam gyi sum mdo dang / bzhi mdo dag tu grong khyer ser skya'i gnas na 'khod pa dang / yul sna tshogs nas
115a3('dul ba): lhags pa'i skye bo'i tshogs la/ shes ldan dag nyon cig/ shAkya ming chen gyi bu mo 'phreng ldan ma/ ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi btsun mor phul lo zhes dril bsgrag pa byas so// de nas
115a4('dul ba): de ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi btsun mor phul bar skye bo phal po che rnams kyis kyang shes so/ / de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis dpal gyi 'byor pa chen pos blangs nas/ mnyan
115a5('dul ba): yod du khrid pa dang / de'i mas bdag gi bus bran mo chung mar blangs so zhes thos te/ de kun nas dkris pa skyes nas bsams pa/ 'di ni nges par pa de'i bu ma yin pa 'am/ bdag gi
115a6('dul ba): khong du don med pa zhig bsrel te/ 'di ltar bran mo'i khyor skyes par gyur to snyam nas/ de yang sems khongs su chud cing 'dug pa dang / rgyal pos kyang 'phreng ldan ma la smras pa/ 'phreng
115a7('dul ba): ldan ma song la sgyug mo'i zhabs la phyag byos shig/ de song ste de'i rkang pa gnyis la bzung ba dang / de reg bya dang ldan pa yin pas/ des reg pa tsam gyis de gnyid log ste/ sad nas
115b1('dul ba): bsams pa/ bu zan ma'i bu mo 'di'i reg pa 'di 'dru bas/ ko sa la'i rigs 'di rgyas par 'gyur ro snyam mo// de'i tshe ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la/ btsun mo dam pa rgyal rigs dbyar
115b2('dul ba): tshul ma dang / 'phreng ldan ma gnyis yod de/ gang gi tshe rgyal po 'phreng ldan ma dang thabs cig bzhugs pa de'i tshe/ 'phreng ldan ma/ rgyal rigs dbyar tshul ma ni 'di lta bur yang gzugs bzang ngo //
115b3('dul ba): zhes dbyar tshul ma'i bsngags pa brjod pa dang / des smras pa/ lha de bdag gis nam zhig na mthong bar 'gyur lags/ rgyal pos smras pa/ ma rings shig dang ring po mi thogs par mthong
115b4('dul ba): bar 'gyur ro/ / de re ba dang bcas pas 'dug go/ gang gi tshe rgyal rigs dbyar tshul ma dang thabs cig 'dug pa de'i tshe yang / dbyar tshul ma/ 'phreng ldan ma ni de lta bu'i reg bya dang yang ldan
115b5('dul ba): pa yin no zhes 'phreng ldan ma'i bsngags pa brjod pa dang / des smras pa/ lha de bdag gis nam zhig na mthong bar 'gyur lags/ rgyal pos smras pa/ ma rings shig dang ring po mi thogs
115b6('dul ba): par mthong bar 'gyur ro/ / de dag rgyal pos ji lta ji ltar ya mtshan bskyed pa de ltar phan tshun mthong bar spro bar gyur to// ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na so ga'i dus la bab ste/ nags tshal
115b7('dul ba): na shing rnams me tog rgyas par gyur cing / ngang pa dang / khrung khrung dang / rma bya dang / ne tso dang / ri skegs dang / khu byug dang / shang shang te'u spa 'byin pa'i skyed mos tshal
116a1('dul ba): gyi gnas su/ rgyal po btsun mo'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor zhing gshegs so// bud med ni me tog dang 'bras bu la dga' ba yin pas/ skyed mos tshal de dang
116a2('dul ba): de dag tu 'khyam par brtsams pa dang / rgyal rigs dbyar tshul ma ngal bas/ skyo zhing snyom par gyur nas/ shing mya ngan 'tshang la skyes te 'dug pa dang / ji tsam na 'phreng ldan mas
